comment: This hotel was very nice, and we enjoyed the marina views...however, I learned to never stay in a room with double beds again...didn't sleep a wink during either night that we stayed. The hotel also lacked in customer service, including being out of towels in the pool area, and maid service that had left food outside of a room for both days we were there...Starbucks was a plus, as were the $5 vouchers if we skipped the maid service.

title: Fabulous rooms
comment: My room at the Belvoir Parsippany was fabulous - sofa with ottoman, VERY comfortable bed with down comforter and several pillows with various firmness. Shower with handle bar when you step in and easy reach shelf for shampoo etc.

title: Not what I expected....
comment: I was in town for a conference which was held at the Belvoir. I knew it would be busy because majority of the conference participants also reserved rooms there. Check in time stated 3pm, but I called the hotel and the rep stated that you could possibly check in as early as 12 if rooms are available. Well I got there around 1:30 pm and no rooms were available ( had reserved 2 rooms and preferred them to be close to each other). I was told I would get a call when the rooms were ready. NEVER RECEIVED A CALL!!! So when the time reached close to 4pm I decided to go to the front desk to check and still no rooms available. Checked again close to 5 and was finally told there maybe rooms but still had to wait. AGAIN NEVER RECEIVED A CALL!! I had to continuously go to the front desk hours after the 3pm check in time. Also was told about additional holds on my credit card (for incidentals and was charged per room) that was not told to me when I made the reservations. Finally got the rooms then in one of them the sheets/beddings were dirty! Had reserved the club lounge floor but was given rooms somewhere else. Club lounge stated snacks, drinks, etc. all day and that was not the case. And I told the customer service rep I only had one car eventhough I reserved 2 rooms. Told them that several times and still when I got my receipt and when I went to check out I was questioned about how many cars I had and the extra parking fees had to be removed. I was very much disappointed with the services.

everyoneShouldKnow: All though the hotel is located near several attractions, once you enter the hotel you feel like you are miles away from the hustle and bustle of the Orlando tourist areas.
title: Very helpful staff, kids had a blast!
comment: Hotel was very nice, front desk staff was very accomodating. My wife informed the front desk staff that it was my birthday and they suprised us with a wonderful room overlooking the pool/recreation area. There were plenty of activities available for our kids (10 & 12) and the pool/recreation staff were very friendly. We were originally planning on visiting Downtown Disney our final day but decided to stay at your hotel instead because we were having such a great time. We will definitely be coming back!!

guestFrom: Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL), 6000 N Terminal Pkwy, Atlanta, GA 30337, USA
everyoneShouldKnow: Noisy and the staff will not quiet offenders.
title: Noisy
comment: "DO NOT" stay at this hotel if you need your rest. I was up all night with noisy next door patrons. I complained to the staff and the management. Problem was not resolved.I will never stay at this hotel again.

title: Great Location
comment: My only disappointment was that my room was located right above the large patio bar next door to the hotel. Both Friday and Saturday night the noise was really loud until 1:30 am!

title: A great place to stay
comment: We were part of a wedding party which was to be held nearby. The hotel staff was fully briefed on the needs of the attendees to the wedding, coordinated beautifully with other arrangements which had been made like the transportation arrangements, and provided a wheelchair for my mother at a moments notice. All was much appreciated.

everyoneShouldKnow: Convient to PVD and to freeways.
title: Convient and Comfortable
comment: Didn't care for the way the lone housekeeper would have 4 or 5 rooms in process but left the doors open for all the rooms while she was inside one room not being able to keep an eye on who went into the open rooms.

everyoneShouldKnow: Everyone is very nice and accomodating. A small neighborhood feeling.
title: Distraught Traveler Review
comment: I am from Boston and live in California. My Sister recently passed away and Carly at BPG check in was so accomodating when I changed rooms - she knew I was upset and went out of her way to take care of me. She even called my room to make sure I was satisfied with the switch, I can stay anywhere in Boston and I always keep coming back to the Belvoir!!

title: Love the warmess of the people
comment: I had a great experience with the staff warm and support.

title: Wonderful staff
comment: Our hotel experience was overall very good. There were a few things that I feel could use improvement. The check-in wait was too long. There was only one person there to check people in. We had to leave and come back. Also, the sofa in the suite were stayed in was filthy. THey really need to throw it in the dumpster. It was that bad. THe linens on it when you open it up however were quite clean. Everything else in the room seemed very clean and well kept. I would like to give special kudos to the food service staff. They were very concerned with getting your food right and on time and called after delivery to make certain everything was good. That was a nice touch. The owner should talk to the City of Houston transportation department, as we waitied in traffic on the frontage road, which is the only entry, for 30 minutes to get to the driveway. That has to be hurting business! Love the bath products too.

title: Great Stay
comment: We were there for a birthday/engagement party and everyone was pleased.

everyoneShouldKnow: Location great from airport, and clean
title: This is a beautiful hotel
comment: I wrote a review on a card given to me in the room and gave it to checkout. The room was spotless, and comfortable, except for the loud humming that seemed to be coming from the vent. I was told it was possible from the dryers that were located in the next room. My room number was #119. I also ordered room service, Pizza and Beer. The pizza was half burnt and I was only able to eat the inside of the pizza. It was too late to reorder and I was too tired to deal with it at the time.

title: Terrible
comment: I had high expectations for this hotel as it is a historical site, however, the site left me with much disappointment. The rooms are in dire need of updating, including the peeling wallpaper, dirty floors, dirty bathrooms, etc. I paid for access to the concierge lounge, however, they failed to tell their patrons that the lounge is closed on the weekends! This is misleading and should certainly be addressed immediately and stated on their website. When checking in, the staff was helpful and stated that we could go up to the lounge and get water. After a long day out, I went up to the lounge and tried to get water. Since I could not access the refridgerator, I called the front desk. Whomever answered the phone was VERY rude and should NOT be in customer service as they told me I should not be there and cut me off everytime I tried responding to her questions. Rediculous! I will NEVER stay there again - in fact, this has tainted my view on Grandbourne Hotels.

everyoneShouldKnow: Club Lounge on 20th Floor has great free breakfast
title: great hotel - will definitely stay next time
comment: we booked 1 night at this Belvoir while on a family vacation through Pennsylvania. it was perfectly situated in the center of Philadelphia and had many wonderful amenities. to start, we were upgraded to the Club Level (I'm a Gold member) and thus had access to their lounge on the 20th floor for breakfast and afternoon treats. The room was clean, comfortable, quiet. The AC was working well so we had no complaints. The garage is only $25 with in and out privileges - very convenient! Overall, we were very pleased and would stay here again.

title: Excellent Location
comment: Very accomodating staff, good breakfast in restaurant. Noisy air conditioning.

title: Excellent Convention Facility
comment: I was a guest of the hotel for a church music conference. From check-in to check-out, I a had the most exception experience. Very Courteous staff, excellent rooms, conference rooms were very accommodating to the need. My overall experience was EXCELLENT

title: Hotel very nice
comment: This hotel was lovely - the only problem we had was I need perfect darkness to sleep and the fire alarm kept blinking and the alarm clock gave off a permanent glow. This was the recommended hotel for the wedding we were attending, but check in time was the same as the wedding time and the hotel should have adjusted that as I had to be very forceful to receive a room in time to change.

title: Great hotel
comment: We were sooo grateful that the spa/pool were open 24 hrs after our marathon day walking in the heat at Disneyland all day! Fitness center great & refreshing that it didn't include a TV. Only complaint was confusing info re: breakfast hours but they were very nice in the dining room & honored our ticket.

title: our stay
comment: I paid $22/day to park in a dirt field. After 2 days I had to have my car washed. The gate that allows you to leave the parking area never did work for my room key.

title: Everything we could have wanted!
comment: Couldn't have asked for anything else.

title: CDI Escape[YEAR-0]
comment: We had a lovely and relaxing time at our conference. Food & service great! Organization by the hotel staff for our conference was also great. Complimentary shuttle service to the Casino was terrific.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great downtown location and updated rooms.
title: great downtown location
comment: Would recommend the hotel to others solely based on the location, convenience, and friendliness of employees. No hotel is perfect, but the quality per dollar spent was definitely worth it at this place.

title: Highly recommended
comment: The staff was exceptionally friendly and accomodating. The room was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed our stay very much and would highly recommend the hotel.

title: hotel was ok
comment: The rooms were spacious, liked how the bath was separate from the vanity. The sheets were stained, dirty, the down comforter was stained dirty. Good thing it was just me staying in the room as I went ahead and used the other bed which was fine. When you see that it really make s one think what else is dirtly and makes the stay very uncomfortable. I travel a lot for work and this has got to be one of the worse stays due to the dirtyness of the sheets/blankets. Disappointed.

title: Staff was great
comment: We were in Northbrook just to get away and to view the Cuneo mansion. Reception staff gave great directions, and our bartender, Joe, was exceptional. He had great dinner and shopping ideas.

title: remodeled [YEAR-1]...hard to believe
comment: this hotel claims to have been remodeled in the last year. the carpet in our room was

everyoneShouldKnow: Beautiful views - walking distance to amazing restaurants - excellent service
title: Great Service and Comfort
comment: Stayed in a room for 4 days with king bed - very nice room - very comfortable bed - service was excellent!

title: Working with my Family needs
comment: We have a family of 5 and needed connecting rooms. When we checked in the rooms were apart, however the General Manager promptly arranged for connecting rooms with an upgrade. Very professional and accomodating.

everyoneShouldKnow: The views from the hotel are amazing.
title: This hotel has amazing views
comment: For a relaxing romantic visit the Mahwah Belvoir is the perfect place. If your on the top floor in the Club Level.

title: Great location
comment: The location allowed for easy access and allowed for walking/sightseeing.

title: Nice size rooms
comment: We usually stay at the other Belvoir closer to Disneyland but decided to try this one. I needed connecting rooms so I called 4 days in advance to let them know and again the day before and each time I was told they would note it but not guarranteed. When I arrived they had NO connecting rooms unless I upgraded to club level.Other than that I liked the hotel the rooms and bathrooms were bigger than the Belvoir I usually stay at near Disneyland. And the Hotel still looks NEW.

everyoneShouldKnow: your employees go out of their way to help.
title: great stay
comment: Your hotel is a beautiful place to stay

title: I will never stay here again
comment: At one point, I am sure this was a nice Embasy Suites. But there have been no improvements at this hotel in years and it shows. Not only that, but the service was lacking and to add insult, no one seemed to care.

everyoneShouldKnow: the hotel is close from evrything ....and the renovations are asome
title: couldn't here the waves
comment: everything was perfect but we stayed in the new sweets in front of the new pool fountain ....i would of liked if you would stop the fountain at night to be able to here the ocean at night!!!! we were counting on hearing the waves at night but we could only here the fountain ...beside that it was perfect like usual ...tahnk you

title: The rooms are very clean and comfortable
comment: I have stayed at this hotel for the past 4 years in September. The rooms are very clean, comfortable and all around inviting. They are all suites, which the only thing missing was a microwave, but that didn't make or break my stay. The employees were friendly and helpful. I have recommended this hotel to a few friends that have showed interest in vacationing at Key West. I love the location because it is away from all the Duvall happenings so when it is time for bed there is no extra noise to contend to yet it is close to the beach and many other activities.

title: What's not to love?
comment: Fabulous views of the harbor, great swimming pool, friendly staff, very nice rooms. Loved the 20 minute chair massage at the spa, what a bargain!!

title: I enjoyed my stay at WDW Dolphin
comment: I love the location, and the good service. I am a bit disappointed that my room smelled musty (another guest on my floor, same side) also mentioned that as well, and that my sink facet didn't have hot water. But really I was out and about so it didn't worry me. Very friendly and helpful staff.

everyoneShouldKnow: not worth the $$$ - be prepared for unsatisfying service and rude staff
title: Beautiful Venue - HORRIBLE service
comment: One would think for such a beautiful resort at a high price, the service would be exceptional.

title: Our stay on 14Sep
comment: Wonderful hotel. Friendliest staff at ALL areas of the hotel. One was nicer than the other.

title: Nice hotel but not all I expected.
comment: The hotel was nice and had a very nice fitness facility. The only complaint I have is that wi-fi was not free. I was not aware of this when I booked the room and would not return because of this reason. Although the cost to get wi-fi was minimal, I would have appreciated that as an included amenity in the price I paid to stay there.

title: Wonderful time
comment: The staff was so welcoming and informative. There were many other events in the hotel the night we stayed, yet we always felt that we were their main focus. The room was beautiful and had everything we could ask for.

title: Property & Resort Look Great!
comment: The property has recently gone under a HUGE renovation and it shows. Everything is clean and neat. Staff is outgoing & friendly. Food was excellent! The stay was wonderful, this property is on the up and up to do some great things! Mahalo!

everyoneShouldKnow: All around excellence with few exceptions
title: Good place to stay
comment: Everything was great except for trying to get a bellperson to come to our room when we were checking out. We called the bellperson, and he assured us he would be right up. One hour later, my wife called the bellperson, and he stated that he had forgotten. Thirty minutes later no bellman. My wife and I carried our own luggage and clothes to our car so we could leave.

title: Fantastic Accommodations & Amenities
comment: This hotel in the middle of the desert with

title: It was great except
comment: I put a reserve on a extra bed and they didn't have it but its ok next time inform me of changes.

everyoneShouldKnow: It is an exellent Hotel if you can stay out of the corner where the AC units are located.
title: The comfortable Beds are the Hotels greates features.
comment: The staff of the Hotel is very friendly and willing to help. We enjoyed the size of the room but not the location. We looked forward to ocean front and received a corner room Ocean view above the noicy airconditioners. Having booked our oceanfront room month in advance, we did not expect that and were very disappointed.

everyoneShouldKnow: Bike rentals. Grab a bike and go for a cruise!
title: Another great trip
comment: The hotel is great but the people are what makes this hotel the best. Jimmy, Gary, DJ and Ashley were always smiling and treated us more like family then hotel guests.

title: Poor facility
comment: The room was adequate, small but clean. The restaurant was poor. On a Sunday morning at 8:30 a.m. our party did not want the buffet and asked for menus. The manager said they did not have any! I told him I had asked ahead and received a breakfast menu and knew they had one. I asked again and he went and came back with 2 menus to share among 9 people! Table service was just okay. Never received a refill of coffee and never received water.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great Disney Access and cost effective, great rooms.
title: Disney Stay Hotel
comment: Everything was great - but the pool was cloudy with lots of bees

everyoneShouldKnow: It is literally a 5 minute walk to universal city walk and universal studios.
title: Friendliest Staff EVER!
comment: To be honest, I didn't spend much time exploring what the hotel had to offer (gym, restaraunt, etc...) but everything about my stay was perfect, valet staff were amazing, the concierge was beyond helpful to my questions and queries and my room was perfectly clean. Not much else to say as the word perfect describes itself for me. 5/5.

everyoneShouldKnow: The personnel are extremely courteous and friendly.
title: Great Customer Service
comment: This hotel exceeded our expectations. Extremely clean and comfortable. Personnel were extremely courteous and friendly! We will defiitely stay there again.

title: excellent hotel
comment: not one problem or glitch

title: High Quality
comment: As we arrived, staff immmediately welcomed us ,asked us if we needed help with our luggage etc. Gorgeous suite. Excellent service at NuBar. Always asking if we needed anything. Loved our stay. Would definitely stay again and recommend hotel. Wedding accomodations perfect!! Thank you all.

title: Beautiful resort on the beach
comment: The resort has a lot to offer, including several restaurants, a relaxing pool area, volleyball courts, fitness center, and nice rooms with balconies. It is located right on the beach for those peaceful morning walks.

everyoneShouldKnow: Make sure you get an inside room
title: Nice but noisy
comment: We loved our visit to San Francisco, the hotel was nice enough however our room was very noisy, woken every morning at 06:00 then 07:00 by trucks being loaded outside our room. The bar is basic in the extreme and more like a bus depot waiting room. No free wifi in rooms??? you get free wifi in Starbucks !!!

title: Comfy Beds
comment: We always stay here overnight, when we're flying through JFK. Rooms are very nice, and beds are very comfortable. We appreciated that they shuttle you and drop you off at what ever airline terminal your traveling.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff treated us like family!
title: Anniversary Couple
comment: My husband and I were so glad that we picked the Belvoir Annapolis Hotel to stay while we celebrated our 10th wedding anniversary. We happened to mention that it was our special day and we felt like royalty during the entire time. Everyone was caring and curteous and went out of thier way to make sure we had a memorable stay while visiting Annapolis. We had time to relax in the pool and use the hot tub- a much needed moment to relax from walking around downtown. We couldn't have asked for more... we will definitely stay here again and recommend it to others!!

everyoneShouldKnow: The excellent, excellent service from the employees
title: Fantastic people work here
comment: The people who work here do everthing to make us feel at home. They are wonderful. Can't say enough good about them.

title: Great location and Staff
comment: Fabulous 4 days at this hotel, great bar staff(especially the twins) and Ceaser, great location and cosy bar. Only down would be no free WiFi in Roms

title: Great Location
comment: The hotel is ideally situated on The Riverwalk.

title: Much Improved
comment: Use this hotel frequently and it has markedly improved. The staff has always been excellent- friendly, courteous and competent, but the linens and bath products have been upgraded and the food from Room Service has improved by quantum measures.

everyoneShouldKnow: Service and frendley people very profecional.
title: Lopez Family
comment: The best services I recomend this beutiful hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Well East of Tampa, in Brandon FL.
title: Rooms and staff need some work
comment: Checked in late after a long day and significant flight delays. Room was nice, but the AC had obviously been off for sometime. Our room on the second floor with a view of a wall even though the parking lot had about 15 cars in it. The sliding glass door well was disgusting. I took a photo of it to show the front desk staff, but after the way I was treated in the morning of our first day there I figured why bother. At check in we were told the club lounge had food until 10 AM, but upon waking up found out it ended at 8:30 the woman at the front desk said that we should just go to the restaurant, and did not attempt to apologize for the employee giving us incorrect information aside from saying she was new. It was a tough weekend to be there and the hotel did not help things at all.

title: Good Location
comment: I thought that the location, the staff, and the pool area were very nice at the hotel.

title: Want to take the bed home!
comment: We recently stayed here during the Iowa v. Iowa State homestand in Iowa City. I was assuming I would have to deal with noise from all of the fans who had come to town, but I was pleasantly surprised at how nice and quiet it was. The hotel was in a great location. The room was great! Comfy king bed. I would definitely stay here again and recommend it to a friend.

title: Need for more healthy food
comment: Only thing missing is more healthier food

title: So-So
comment: $17 dollars for pancakes, really? Self parking card reader is something that needs attention. Lanai buildings are dated Would not stay again

everyoneShouldKnow: The service was really good and the club lounge was very nice. I really liked the 24 hour access to the lounge. I wish they left more snacks and beverages out during the overnight hours.
title: Very comfortable
comment: I had a really good stay!

title: guest
comment: is a place full in advantages. i was happy with the services..front desk and all services were super good

title: the room was great
comment: the hotel was very nice, the restaurant and employees where great, without a doubt I would very much recommend the Hotel.

title: Great Hotel
comment: This is my second stay at the Belvoir. I felt my first room previously was much cleaner and smell better. The balcony was big but dirty on the recent visit. Bed was very comfort. Overall, the hotel was great.

title: A little disappointed...
comment: This hotel was clean and comfortable, but had a few issues. The window opened out to parking garage with was always packed with noisey car. We couldn't open the drapes at any time to enjoy the sun. In addition, we were there for 5 days, and the ice machine was out on my floor the entire time. We had to go up and down to get ice. Also, twice, we had no toilet paper in the bathroom and had to call to get it brought up. Not the level of service I am used to from Belvoir................

title: Staff
comment: Hotel staff was excellent. Jessie at the front desk was very helpful.

everyoneShouldKnow: Rent the cabana by the pool
title: Weekend 11 miles from home
comment: We rented one of the cabanas at the pool for the day. Sarah our server was incredible. She was there but yet not on top of us. Highly recommend the rental worth every penny. The food in the Mexican "restaurant" was poor and way over priced -- would not recommend.

everyoneShouldKnow: Location is perfect for trip to Legoland
title: Perfect Location
comment: Perfect Location if going to Legoland, you skip all the lines and walk into the back gate! Also super close ( couple miles) to Carlsbad outlets, good restaurants and the beach! Only complaint is that the beds are a bit 'noisy', like the mattresses had plastic on them so whenever one of us rolled over; woke the other one up, however, location and cleanliness were so good that we would definitely stay there again!

title: Very clean...perfect location for City Walk & Universal.
comment: Everything was great except for the hard beds =back aches. Would stay again but will have to check beds 1st :-)

title: Great for the Fair
comment: We will never go to the fair again without staying at the Belvoir. It was the best experience. The room was beautiful, staff helped us check in early and ensured we had a refrigerator for medications. Couldn't have asked for more.

title: Hotel stay was wonderful
comment: Nice amenities and comfortable bed.

title: Comfortable Stay
comment: The hotel was very centrally located for our visit to the Bay Area. The rooms were clean, well appointed and quiet. We very much appreciate that our dog could stay with us and the staff accomodated our desire for first floor with a patio.

everyoneShouldKnow: The location is great for the wine country and the coast!
title: This hotel offered me exactly what I needed!
comment: Our stay at this hotel was wonderful. We used the Petaluma location as our home basse for our visit to the Wine Country. It was easy to get everywhere and we even went to the Pacific Coast one day which was a treat. The staff offered great advice, directions and went out of their way to help us.

title: Horrible Customer Service
comment: I recently stayed at this facility for a business meeting. On the first night I retired to my room about 8 pm. All night I listened to the train squeal to a halt right outside my room. At 2am I finally decided to call the front deesk and ask to move. I was told someone would get back to me shortly. No one ever returned my call. The next night same thing same result. So the next morning I went to the front desk and wa told there wa nothing they could do because I was receiving a discounted rate due to my business trip. Upon check out I figured I would complain one last time (let them know how horrible their customer service was) the lady at the counter asked what should she do about it....not apology. Finally the lady next top her said just giver her 2000 star points. Star points what are startpointsand if I am unhappy with your facility and only there on business what makes you think I am going to return tio use my star points. I paid over $500 for my room and was compensated with star points.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff really knows what customer service is, great service is a guarantee here at this hotel
title: Great location
comment: My stay was awesome, the staff are wonderful, and my room was perfect

everyoneShouldKnow: Check-in is smooth and easy. Check-out..even easier. Great location.
title: Highly recommended
comment: Professional, helpful, courteous staff. Comfortable, clean facility. Definitely a place to stay for a weekend/week away from home. Closeness to beach is attractive and walking distance to the main restaurants of Fort Lauderdale Beach is convenient. Positively recommend.

title: love the stay and play package
comment: great views, close to the mountain

title: STAFF
comment: THE ENTIRE STAFF INCLUDING PARKING HOUSEKEEPING AND FRONT DESK ARE HELPFUL AND COURTEOUS. ABOVE AND BEYOND EXPECTATIONS.

everyoneShouldKnow: The property is beautiful with plenty of outdoor areas for relaxing.
title: Belvoir Hotels & Resorts - Fabulous
comment: I attended a conference at this hotel the week of September 10th. My room was perfect! The sweet sleeper bedding was very comfortable. I had an excellent view of the east bay, marina, and San Diego downtown skyscape. It was so relaxing. The pool area was nice and the hot tub was large, clean, and just right. I had a great stay and would definitely recommend it to everyone. Oh, I can't forget to tell you that the property grounds are beautiful with plenty of areas for sitting (even an evening fire pit)!

title: Philly
comment: At Belvoir hotels you generally get a nice hotel, what really distinguishes the Belvoir Dover is the staff. Everyone I encountered was friendly, professional and will go out of their way to be helpful

everyoneShouldKnow: I had trouble locating the hotel; I was tried and frustrated. The second day was a piece of cake.
title: Great Staff
comment: Staff was friendly and very accommodating. When staff is eager to assist, you want to visit again. I'm from Chicago and requested specific information regarding sites. I received honest opinions. The front desk assisted with directions by printing same -- not simply pointing me to the computer.

title: Great staff and good location
comment: I was in the area for a conference and the people, rooms and location were excellent. Great staff, large clean rooms, nice amenities.

title: Lovely hotel
comment: Had a great stay. The staff were great and the room was clean, comfortable, and well equipped. Would definitely stay again!

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is really nice and go out of their way to make you comfortable.
title: Great Vacation Spot
comment: This Hotel gives you fun in the sun as well as fun after sundown. Great restaurants, and really nice staff.

title: Got plenty of rest
comment: Very clean, quite hotel. The staff provided a map and information about where we were interested in going for dinner, Got a good nights sleep. Easy to get back on the interstate when we were ready to leave,

title: Close to Metro
comment: Hotel is block from Metro stop. Staff was friendly and would stay again.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff provides excellent customer service
title: Awesome Staff and Hotel
comment: The staff was exceptionally nice and helpful. I needed a hotel to stay with my pet and being able to bring her to the Belvoir was a dream come true. I hope to have the chance/need to stay there again!!

everyoneShouldKnow: Places to eat within walking distance.
title: So tired
comment: It was fine, Very clean and quite. Just needed some sleep.

title: Hotel was very good except:
comment: It was very noisey on the of the hotel were our room was.

title: Love the pillows
comment: I always use Belvoir because the beds are comfortable and the pillows are awesome. Bedding is crisp and clean.

title: Pleasant stay!
comment: My recent stay at the Belvoir in Parsippany was very pleasant. The staff was attentive and my room was comfortable with tasteful decor. The meeting rooms were a high standard, and the meal was good.

title: Will return
comment: My husband and I have stayed several times at this Belvoir. The rooms are large, clean and the bed is very, very comfortable. The pool, and weight room are great. All the hotel staff we encountered were very helpful. The shuttle to the airport was very convenient and on time. My only disappointment was the bar and restaurant service.

everyoneShouldKnow: Nice place to stay but complicated exit from highway
title: Club lounge was great
comment: It was my second stay at this hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Too noisy inside and outside. Homeless people sleeping outside the hotel on all the benches sorrounding property.
title: could not sleep
comment: My room - 812 was next to ice machine. Machine was running all night and I could not sleep. I tried to change room was told hotel was full. Nothing else was offered as a result not even an apology.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location and staff very friendly
title: Evaluations Improve the Product
comment: Carpeting in the hallway of 7th floor was loose and buckled. It appeared to have been repaired at least once. It needs to be replaced. Room carpet needs to be checked out also. The bathroom is tiny and because of its size makes closing the door a noticeable inconveneince. The lack of a sink and vanity inside the bathroom is also a negative. The outside sink would be a plus if there was an inside one as well. The location and staff are excellent and I would recommend this hotel based on those factors.

title: nyc
comment: the associate checking us in was very helpful and pleasant.

title: Small Refrigerators should be in rooms
comment: The rooms should be equiped with small refrigerators. Ice buckets are way too small

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location at the center of Boston's active area.
title: Nice Suite
comment: Everything was nice and appropriate. Suite was large and comfortable. Bathroom was standard, but a bit small. Closet was very small and filled with Ironing board, iron, safe, that took up a lot of space.

title: Great Location
comment: If you want to go to Epcot THIS Is the hotel to stay at. Wonderful location. Food is pricey but there are many options.

everyoneShouldKnow: Only two miles from airport. Choices for dining. Very clean.
title: Website inconsistency
comment: I had an early flight out of Burlington so wanted a hotel with a 24 hour shuttle service. The Grandbourne website indicates this hotel has such a service but the local site indicates the service is not 24 hours. Guess which site I checked before I booked? The staff were very helpful and arranged a bellman and shuttle for 4am. Unfortunately no one showed up, but when I called down at 4:15am, they were very responsive, and I was at the airport on time. The on screen check out was also not operational. The food and service in the pub were excellent.

title: The hotel
comment: we were treated very well,John form the concierge desk went beyond his call of duty to help us and make us feel very welcomed. We would like to come back when time permits

title: Food
comment: Food at both resuranst was too expensive!

title: This hotel was clean and staff very helpful
comment: Stayed in hotel while visiting my son at college, location was great, staff was very kind and helpful, and most important, room was clean.

title: 2 changes needed
comment: There needs to be a place to plug in your computer and phone on the desk, not "under" the desk. Also need a bedside table on "both" sides of the bed.

title: perfect weekend getaway
comment: This facility is the perfect weekend getaway. The rates actually go down on the weekends . there are several attractions within just a few miles of the hotel. I came to down for my daughters b-day we spent the day at great america. and came back to the hotel to enjoy their beautiful pool area which is salt water by the way. the staff is friendly and makes you feel right at home. both donald and odessa are awesome and truly standout out as an asset to the team. thank you for your hard work

title: Hotel has everything to offer and more
comment: Love this property. Well located, with all the extras that you would want.

everyoneShouldKnow: It old and dirty and the elevators don't work.
title: Below Average
comment: For being one of the larger hotels in Birmingham this one is at best below average. The carpets in this place are terrible. One morning I waited 15 minutes for the elevator because there was only one working. Most of the stay only two were working. The rooms were average and the AC cut off in the middle of the night if there was no movement in the room. Overall not up to Grandbourne standards and conisdering it is attached to the convention center I expected more.

title: Excellent meeting experience
comment: The hotel was awesome location and the service that I recieved was amazing, especially for the meeting the server and the captain who provided us with the meals did an excellent job. Kuddos to them for making my stay a wondeful experience.

title: Overall good
comment: Floors needed to be swept and cleaned. Pet and human hair all over floors.

title: Always Wonderful
comment: Great night and the kids always love the breakfast buffet.

everyoneShouldKnow: Consistent good service from each employee encountered
title: Great Experience
comment: Extremely friendly check in staff person named J.B. She was able to handle several people at a time without seeming over extended. I know I didn't feel like she had another customer, even though I saw one. Fast elevators. I was staying on 9, and never had to wait more than a minute in either direction. Comfortable room, and was surprised to be able to open window to balcony and get breeze. Didn't get to experience other amenities because I was with a group that had everything included. However, the staff tending to our event was fast, efficient and friendly as well. Food was very good and nice variety.

title: Upgrade was great
comment: We were very satisfied with the upgrade to Club floor 9. The Club lounge offered great appetizers and a wonderful breakfast every day. Thank you for a great stay!

title: 45 DAY road trip
comment: This is the 16th Grandbourne hotel on this trip.

everyoneShouldKnow: Plan t use the shuttle and wait, wait wait for pickup
title: Mgmt fixed some issues
comment: We had some issues with the shuttle service (to Harris Teeter and return). Ast mgr Claire made an effort to correct the matter after the fact. We appreciated her actions and left a thank you note. We encountered another shuttle mishap the next day but chose not to mention it. We'd probably return to this hotel for a few short stays. Location is convenient to airport but nothing very close by w/out shuttle (which is dubious at best).

guestFrom: Fairplex Trailer Park, 1101 W McKinley Ave, Pomona, CA 91768, USA
title: This hotel is great!
comment: We do a ladies weekend each year. We love the hotel. All employees are helpful and kind. The hotel rooms are clean and plenty of room. This hotel meets all our needs. We will be back again next year.

title: This hotel is located in a great spot.
comment: This hotel is the best value in its class. The rooms are exceptional and the staff was very friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Room was spacious and great but TERRIBLE CHEAP TOILET PAPER
comment: Great room but guys the toilet paper is CHEAP. Room 1210. It is embarrassing. Also the linens could be a lot softer. With such a beautiful room and great location and view but terrible TOILET PAPER.

title: Needs a good scrubbing
comment: I love almost everything Disney and I was looking forward to staying on property and visiting the parks. I checked into the Dolphin and was pleasantly greeted. I arrived in the room and noticed that there was hair and bloody cotton balls in one of the garbage cans. The bathroom needed a good scrubbing. The floors were dingy, there was caked-on dirt in the corners, and the wall behind the door was filthy. I don't know what was covering the wall but it was not pleasant. I arrived late and just wanted to take a hot shower, order some room service and get ready for the next day. There was no room service menu in the room and I called to ask if a menu could be sent up. Twenty minutes later I was still waiting. I figured out that there was a 24 hour restaurant located 2 levels below the lobby floor. The menu did not appear until the next day when I returned to the room. The rest of the stay was fine.

title: Awesome Staff!
comment: Our room was still being cleaned. Front office went above and beyond to help start our vacation on a good note.

title: Friendly and helpful with added comfort
comment: The hotel staff was friendly and answered questions as well as provided suggestions on activities around the local area. The rooms were comfortable, check-in and check-out eas, and the location was nice and close to Sonoma and Napa Valleys. I recommend this hotel.

title: Comfortable setting
comment: The hotel lives up to the standards I have come to know and expect at Grandbourne Hotels. The staff was courteous and helpful and the hotel was clean and welcoming.

everyoneShouldKnow: Lobby staff, bell hops, and valets were class-acts. Jerome was so kind to me.
title: The staff was really great and friendly!
comment: The staff was really great and friendly!

title: Outstanding JFK Property
comment: JFK area has numerous 2 star properties with nightly prices approaching Maui beachfront charges.

title: Below par
comment: I travel a lot and have seen many hotels including Belvoir(I am Platinum BPG) all over the world and this hotel did not meet my expectations. Some issues that were obvious and need to be called out according to me:

title: Belvoir Waikiki
comment: Love the rooms great view

everyoneShouldKnow: Location and convenience for airport and rental cars
title: 5 minutes from LAX
comment: The hotel has a great location at the entrance to LAX airport but is also a convenient place to stay to visit Santa Monica, Venice Beach, Playa del Rey etc.Large spacious rooms, nice outdoor pool and good buffet breakfast. We will certainly stay here again. Rental car return offices are also within 5 minutes of the hotel. Altogether very convenient for everything.

everyoneShouldKnow: Two of the nicest hotels in Disney World.
title: My favorite hotels in Disney World.
comment: The Swan and Dolphin are my favorite places to stay while in Disney World. They are clean, beds are comfortable and the transportation to the parks are very convient. They do offer special rates to teachers, nurses and Florida residents.

title: Recent stay
comment: When I arrived in my room there was a heavy cigarette smell. They willingly changed my room although there was no offer to help. I like this hotel. I have stayed there several times recently but the overall service wasn't up to par.

title: This hotel is great
comment: Keep it up!!!!!!!!!!! It's one of the best hotels where I and my family have been in.

everyoneShouldKnow: The hotel is in a great location right by Harvard Square.
title: Historic Hotel with Modern Amenities
comment: This is the second time I've stayed at the Commander, I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay in Boston. It's more like a boutique hotel than a typical "Belvoir". The staff are all very friendly, rooms are very clean. My only complaint was that housekeepiing kept coming into the room in the morning, without knocking to clean the room and it was only 9am. I didnt have a sign on the outside of the door but seems you should knock before just opening someone's door.

title: this hotel exceeded my expectations
comment: The hotel shuttle to and from old town was an excellent advantage. the staff was attentive an very helpful in answering any questions and taking care of any concerns.

everyoneShouldKnow: They did not charge the correct credit card for the room. Have been unable to correct as of 1 day after being notified. They said they had it correct when we checked out.
title: Staff excellent, but stay charged to wrong card
comment: When we arrived, my friend and I immediately asked to have the charges split between her room and mine. Other hotels have done this with no problem. When we checked out, the clerk said it looked like the entire stay was still charged to my card. So he swiped hers and had to do it twice. The entire stay ended up on her credit card. Calls to the hotel have not resolved the issue as yet. Because we need the receipts properly charged and listed for taxes, this is unacceptable.

title: Very disappointing
comment: This hotel has a very beautiful section called the Atrium with interior rooms. Unfortunately, I was placed on the other side in the tower. This area seems to be older and somewhat dingy. My first issue was a broken TV remote control. Not a big deal and they quickly replaced it. Next I set up my laptop and prepared to log in only to find out that they are still charging for internet. $8 per night for low speed (which was horrible) and $24 per night for high speed. Next you find out that they don't have wireless. Really??? Before I could use the wired option I had to have the ethernet cable replaced due to a broken end piece. Now I'm finally hooked up ready to get some work done while watching Monday night football. My next issue was the TV. It's a beautiful big flat screen and they seem to be up to date because 80% of the channels are HD. Unfortunately none of the HD channels work. I had to scrap the horrible internet that I already paid for and watch the game in the lobby. I also had issues with my toilet. It would run continuously and was very loud so I was constantly jiggling the handle trying to get it to stop in the middle of the night. After my long night I headed to the lobby to find some coffee because no one likes the horrible little coffee makers in the rooms. The coffee never tastes good when it comes out of one of those things. I was happy to see that they had coffee available but unhappy to see that it was $2 per cup. After paying a premium room rate, paying to park (yes you must pay to park here), and paying for internet... Paying $2 for coffee was a little more than irritating. I will not be using this hotel again.

title: Billing issue for business traveler
comment: Issue with billing the wrong credit card presented card to be used at check in, but they billed the card that I used to guarantee the room. Caused much confusion with my business in trying to be reimbursed for my personal credit card. Maybe more training at the front desk?

guestFrom: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), 1 World Way, Los Angeles, CA 90045, USA
everyoneShouldKnow: Bring extra money for parking and a flashlight for a late walk back
title: expected to much from four star hotel
comment: I expected more from a 4 star hotel that was represented. The front desk was rude at check in when I asked about parking. The tub didn't drain you had water up to your ankles after shower. The bed was not comfortable at all. Back parking lot was dark at night when you walked back late. Be sure to make revservation through hotel and not third party you don't get the same treatment as a first class guest. Thats why we were stuck in a room right by elevator and it sounded like a party in the hall all night when people came in. Didn't sleep well at all. We were celebrating our 20 year wedding anniversary so I was disappointed. All the other reviews were great so that made me even more disppointed.

title: Nice staff LOUD housekeepers
comment: At check in i had a great experience. Years ago I was a BPG but my membership was no longer active, The guy who checked us in researched it and enrolled me again in a matter of seconds, then he asked the person who I was traveling with if he was a BPG and researched his account and made that active again too. He made us feel like a VIP. Rooms were great. The doors to the rooms need to be adjusted so they do not slam when people exit into the hallway. Each morning as soon as people left the hotel room you would hear doors slaming. There wa also an issue with the house keeping staff talking so lound in the hall that it would wake anyone up. Over all I would stay here again. Good location and value for the money.

title: Great work out room
comment: One of the best I have stayed at. Very good. Will stay there for the work out room.

title: great stay
comment: Pleasant stay at the Belvoir. As a Platinum, I was upgraded to a beautiful suite with 2 bathrooms, living room, dining area and kitchen. Location of hotel is excellent. Valet parking a bit slow, just plan to call 15-30 minutes prior to arrange for your car. Will definitely stay here again. Shula's is a bit expensive, but well worth it.

title: Very friendly staff
comment: The staff at this hotel is excellent. They were there for all our needs.

title: Excellent Customer Service
comment: The customer service I received was super. way beyond my expectations...Carrie, Jeff, Martin, Derek and Joe went way out of their way to make sure everything was really great for me....I was very touched...they really gave 5 star hotel service....

title: needs improvement
comment: very noisy. took 2 days to sort out air conditioning. for the price not great.

title: Very helpful staff
comment: We booked a cabana suite which happened to be on the third floor without elevator access. The night we arrived, the manager helped carry all the luggage (thirteen pieces) up to the third floor room and wouldn't accept any tips from us. The staff was very friendly and provided immediate assistance when requested.

title: nice place
comment: good quality for the price

title: nice hotel
comment: rooms in very good coditions,staff very good,

title: Clean but snug
comment: Great location, courteous staff. Queen room rather small but clean. Bathroom snug. Could have used better lighting at mirror. Please no smoking outside at front door--had to wade through smoke smell at all hours!

everyoneShouldKnow: Full on all around perfect experience
title: phenomenal staff, location and brunch buffet
comment: EVERYONE was so nice. The place was beautiful. The walking path was fantastic. The breakfast buffet was so amazing. I can't wait to get back there and I will start staying at more Belvoirs. I was greatly surprised and beyond happy. Thanks for a short but grand trip. Outstanding!

title: Comfortable Room with Pleasant Staff
comment: The room was nice, the pool was beautiful and the staff was great. The beds were super comfy and I loved the fluffy pillows. Overall, my stay was great. However, I was disappointed by the small bathroom and the per day charges for parking and wireless. I would definitely stay here again

title: Nice facility
comment: Enjoyed my stay. Small but very comfortable rooms. Front desk staff directed me to a nearby rental car agency after my reservation was cancelled at the airport. The only problem I had was at check out. They tried to charge me three nights for a roll away cot that I had one night. The error was fixed. I also was dissapointed when I was charged a significant fee for internet use. And, I overheard another guest checking in who was told they would be receiving complimentary internet use. Most hotels now offer complimentary internet use.

title: Great hotel, great staff
comment: This was a great hotel. I loved the location, found staff to be helpful and would definately stay here again. Frank Greene was awesome and I loved his enthusiam for his job. I recommend letting him take you downtown while visiting the area.

title: Great hotel but room cleanliness was poor
comment: First and foremost we always stay at the Dolphin and we have nothing but good things to say. But this time around we had several bumps in the road. Our initial room was not cleaned to the point it wasn't healthy to sleep in. So at about 11:00 pm after a day at the park with th kids we had no other choice but to move to another room. After moving and settleing in, this room had its issues. Frustration began to settle in but after speaking with the night manager she assured us that things would be fixed and they were. The remainder of our stay was great. Hopefully they will be able to correct the issues with the room cleanliness.

title: GreatStay
comment: This is the fourth time we have stayed at this hotel and every stay has been wonderful. We will continue staying here.

everyoneShouldKnow: The property is gorgeously landscaped, very clean and very well-maintained.
title: Repeat visit well worth it!!!
comment: This was our second visit here, our first one being several years back. This time we stayed in the larger of the one bedroom villas. We loved it! The furnishings and decor were exquisite, the room very large and comfy. We loved the whirlpool tub in the bedroom and the oversized shower in the bathroom. The grills located throughout the property were a wonderful touch. We were able to prepare a very romantic 33rd Anniversary dinner, complete with grilled steaks in the evening. The pool, outdoor whirlpool bath and Splash poolside grille were enjoyed for many hours. Belvoir Desert Oasis allowed us to take a brief break from our hectic lives filled with caring for grandbabies. Best staycation ever...

title: Great Hotel
comment: Thoroughly enjoyed my stay

everyoneShouldKnow: Outstanding staff. Everyone we met was friendly and helpful.
title: Excellent facility and staff
comment: Beautiful facility with attentive friendly staff. Clean comfortable beds, excellent food, pool/hot tub area was well maintained. Spectacular view of the pool area and the Gulf. We have already recommended this facility to family and friends who are planning on visiting the area. We can't wait to visit again!

everyoneShouldKnow: Good location and easy commute to French Quarters. Staff is very nice. Fix cleaning issues and this hotel could be a Gem!
title: Disappointed
comment: This hotel is nicely decorated, however the rooms are not cleaned daily if staying more than one night! It is just tidied-up slightly! Our garbage can was not emptied for two days, toilet tissue roll not replenished when it ran out, and carpet not vacuumed. Housekeeping took dirty towels and forgot to replace them. Never vacuumed carpets. My husband and I were there for 4 nights! I was told that they only straighten rooms, no cleaning. Everyone deserves a clean room and fresh linen. That is one of the luxuries expected when vacationing! This is the first time a BPG property disappointed us!

everyoneShouldKnow: You will get a good nights sleep.
title: Excellent location
comment: The room was on the small side, but very comfortable....especially the bed. Clean. Very friendly and helpfu staff. The location was great...easy in and out of Manhatten with subways close by. Walking the surrounding neighborhoods was great. Junior's cheese cake a block away! BPG recognition needs some work....that might be the only poor grade.

title: A Wonderful Experience
comment: This is the nicest Belvoir we've ever stayed in, and we would highly recommend it to anyone who wants to get off the beaten path and relax away from the noise of the city. The staff treated us very well right from the beginning, and continued to take great care of us until we departed. We are looking forward to returning again next year.

title: Fabulous hotel & location
comment: Great hotel, fab location just a few blocks away from Broadway, many main attractions, bus station, shops and restaurants all within walking distance. Staff were very helpful, always pleasant and eager to help. Miles in the bar is one great guy, always looks after customers. 5 stars all round stay.

everyoneShouldKnow: Considering the hotel was redone recently..I had a light that kept flickering even after maintenaince checked it..a door that was difficult to close...no good chair if one is sitting at a computer...and it was terrible that 5 false firealarms at 1am were not followed by a public announcement...could it be that announcement system doesnt exist? the property is beautiful..this was my 12th visit I think...I used points for a couple of nights and was shocked to be charged the resort fee!!! if the night is free ..its FREE NO hidden costs
title: A Gem
comment: the hotel is a great property however there must be a constant challenge to keep it the best

title: Best room ever
comment: I stayed in room 823 at the Arlington, TX Belvoir and I have to say, that is the best room I've ever stayed in. The cleaneist, roomiest, most enjoyable stay I've had at this Belvoir hotel.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great remodel a few years ago!
title: Great hotel
comment: I have stayed here before and love this hotel. We like staying in the tower. Love the pool and workout facility. Love that it's pet friendly!!!!!!

title: Best beach location in Kauai
comment: This hotel has a fabulous beach. The sunsets are spectacular. One of the best things about this hotel that makes us keep coming back is their staff especially, Lonnie, Robi, Katie and Annie who always make us feel like we are home. This was our 9th year in a row and we are already looking forward to the 10th.

title: Improvement
comment: Extensive remodling since my last stay a year ago. A significant improvement.

title: This is a nice hotel
comment: Comfortable, very clean and really nice people. I got the feeling that they would do whatever it takes to get something done !

everyoneShouldKnow: Very easy access to I-40, good resturants available in area and onsite.
title: Overnight business stay
comment: I thorougly enjoyed my stay! I had a physician recruitment fair in the hotel and the comfort and convenience of my room was exceptional. Thank you!

everyoneShouldKnow: It works well with a large groups
title: The foyer entrance was awesome
comment: The daily water feature in the foyer wa really good. The hotel staff were all friendly and knowledgeable about the amenetiies. The whirlpool was really relaxing

title: All-around comfort
comment: Everything was great, except no hot tubs.

title: Convenent Place to Stay
comment: This is a very good location. Easy walk to restaurants, good public transportation. Only complaint was rude bellman on arrival.

title: This hotel is the best.
comment: Even though we stayed under the Starhot programme we found the staff, room and food to be excellent. I was impressed when a staff member asked me to whom we were related within the Grandbourne company.

everyoneShouldKnow: Only good for proximity to JFK
title: Weak service
comment: As a gold member, I expect to be treated better. I was given a room right next to the elevator and woken up several times through the night.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location, just needs some renovation
title: Great staff, needs some room makeover
comment: Stayed in the middle of September for a business conference:

everyoneShouldKnow: they charge $10 for parking each night
title: Great Experience
comment: My husband and I spent our one year anniversary at this hotel and it was better than we expected. The staff was very nice and helpful and the hotel was absolutely beautiful. The only thing that we did not appreciate was that we were not told when we made the reservations that we would be charged $10 a night for parking. Overall, I would definitely recommend the Belvoir Lake Buena Vista Resort to anyone.

everyoneShouldKnow: A very nice Chicago O'Hare hotel
title: Great O'Hare Hotel
comment: This is not a new hotel, but its rooms are very well appointed - large front "suites" - comfortable furniture and beds - the only draw back is rather small bathroom.

title: Registration desk staff was very good.
comment: Pool was closed for renovations. Had to call for more pillows which took awhile. Ran out of towels..had to dry with wash cloth. Towels eventually came but much too late. Had a service at Arlington Cemetery...staff did not know exact turns and print off of directions was incorrect. We could see the cemetery from our room but had to travel about 8 miles to get there.

everyoneShouldKnow: Lacking sense of urgency to meet customers expectations
title: No sense of urgency
comment: I happen to stay there this week. I had come off back to back weeks of travel , so I brought 3 items that needed to be dry cleaned. The dry cleaners lost my items (2nd time this has happened at this hotel). However, the lack of sense of urgency by the staff is what was so alarming. When i woke up to find out if they had located my clothing, they were still waiting for a response from an email sent to the dry cleaners the evening before. At 9:30 am, i had to call them to see if they had located and I was told they havent called back yet!! WTF! I waited another hour and NOTHING. So, I had my admin call the manager of the hotel and I finally got an answer back. A hotel and my stay, is only as good as the staff surrounding my visit. VERY disappointing to say the least.

title: wonderful place
comment: had a great time and the staff was great

title: Excellent value for business traveler
comment: The rooms are comfortable and quiet. Internet service is fast and accessible. The breakfast facility works -- Starbucks coffee (including latte etc) and some simple breakfast sandwiches / pastries and wide open space to be able to work./meet. Staff very helpful.

title: Poor signage; needs repair
comment: Very, very confusing in trying to find meeting rooms between the two towers. What signs were there were difficult to follow and many were covered by other conference's signs. My guest room needed some TLC with paint peeling on the door and something growing in the shower.

everyoneShouldKnow: If you're not happy with the location of your room, the front desk staff is very accomodating.
title: Fine for a few days
comment: It was fine. The staff were very helpful. it wasn't a noisy hotel which is a blessing. Unfortunately, hotel wear & tear was obvious in the guest rooms and I'm not sure if there was any real sort of entrance security there.

guestFrom: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur, Mexico
everyoneShouldKnow: How safe and appreciated the staff makes you feel.
title: Employees of the hotel..
comment: I have never been at a hotel where all the staff was so content. It seems they have a manager that listens to them. They seem to feel like a team. My work is in North County but I commute while here JUST to be able to stay at Belvoir.

title: straightforward
comment: * Staff was helpful and considerate, one front desk official in particular.

title: Friendly
comment: WIthout a doubt THE most friendly hotel staff I have ever experienced. Not a single member of the staff failed to smile and ask if they could help. Great Job.

everyoneShouldKnow: Right off the highway and close to restaurants and other services in the area.
title: Business Meeting Sep [YEAR-0]
comment: Had a great time during a very short stay in Roanoke for business. The staff was great in handling the details and very friendly. Rooms clean and price very competitive. Would highly recommend Belvoir and I always get consistend high quality service from all Grandbourne properties everywhere I stay.

title: Not interested
comment: Why I am REQUIRED to do this. All I want is to rate my experience which I did as excellent

everyoneShouldKnow: under renovation, desparately needed, avoid until finished
title: Awful
comment: The first room I was checked into had leaking windows. Not mere drips, but actual cascades of water. There was scafolding outside, so this must be due for some work yet to be done. Nonetheless, the room was uninhabitable, and should be on a "do not use" list until that is done.

everyoneShouldKnow: The shuttle service is accountable and consistently good. The front desk team is very helpful. The general manager also provides excellent customer service.
title: Consistent Service
comment: I have stayed in this hotels for several months now. The night shuttle driver was always helpful and never late picking me up. The front desk manager and staff are very friendly, and they always accommodate my needs. Overall, the service is consistently good!

title: Wait to stay here until remodeled!
comment: I arrived at hotel and was given a room on '2nd floor' which ended up being a balcony right at ground level and smelled like someone had been smoking in it. For safety reasons I asked for another room and was moved one floor up. Later I noticed this new room had ants in the bathroom and also crawling on the bed! I packed up and went to front desk and was moved to room on 12th floor. Hotel is just beginning remodeling so I'm hopeful that some of this will be better.

title: Great stay, excellant staff and location!!
comment: Had a very enjoyable stay in this downtown hotel, a great Grandbourne property. The staff is friendly and very helpful, and my room was quiet and comfortable.

everyoneShouldKnow: Way too expensive rooms and food
title: Room and food very over priced
comment: The Belvoir Preimiere has a great name, but it doesn't live up to it's name. The rooms are OK, but quite expensive for the area. However, the food was extremely overpriced, for example, a bagel for $12 or a hamburger for $18! This is outrageous. When we asked to have a lunch meeting, the price was $65 per lunch, which is absurd. Finally, the halls and stairways are extremely musty smelling.

everyoneShouldKnow: As first timers to Waikiki, I could not think of a better place to experience all this area has to offer.
title: Outstanding
comment: Excellent stay, outstanding stay, but having access to bathroom facilities in the workout room is an absolute must!

title: Staff needs training
comment: I called prior to arrival and was hung up on in the middle of a sentence. Check-in was clumsy and the front desk staff was more attentive to other staff than to their customers.

title: Wonderful Experience
comment: I loved the Hotel, and evertthing about it. My child is attending a local College, so I will return often. I did feel the rooms should have refrigerators, or not charge . I did not understand the Room Service, I tried to order an Irish Coffee at night and the restaurant had no idea what I was asking for and suggested I pick it up. I threw the drink out after tasting. So that is the only service I would change

title: Great location - Nice vues
comment: This is a very nice hotel, nice vue of the Golf and Miami skylines.

title: Not impressed
comment: I am a Belvoir member. I stayed at this hotel in [YEAR-3] as well. Over the last 3 years this hotel has gone downhill. The only positives I have is the customer service at the front desk. The hallway smelled and the rugs were filthy. The room itself had the popcorn ceiling cracked all the way around the room. Very disappointed in this hotel. Will most likely try the Belvoir Inner Harbor next time.

everyoneShouldKnow: Location to AC boardwalk and casinos is great. Good bar/restaurant attached to it. Miss America contestants stayed there. Very nice pictures of the contestants etc
title: I would stay there again
comment: Hotel was nice and near the AC boardwalk and other casinos. Service was very good from the front desk, bellman, valet cashier. Only things that could have been better: rugs in room could have been cleaner, they didn't have any magazines with stuff to do around town, there were no coffee cups for the coffee and we asked for them to be brought up to us. We waited 1/2 hour or more for the cups and they never brought them, and we had to leave.

title: Late Arrival
comment: Overall a very good experience. We arrived very late as our flight was delayed. When we arrived to the hotel the restaurant had closed (no problem with that). However, the only option the front desk could offer us was a McDonalds about 10 minutes away (Not an option for my family). We set out to find a place for something light and found Smokey Bones (open until 2AM). My suggestion is that the front desk staff have a list of restaurants in the area and their hours of operation for those unfortunate times when guest have been delayed and famished upon arrival. Having salads at the gift shop would have solved the problem. Ask not to be put in the corner of the hotel, after a very long day & night, we awoke the next morning to the roaring of HVAC units on the roof just above the corner room we had been assigned. Needless to say we moved rooms as we were staying for another 2 days.

everyoneShouldKnow: The location is perfect if going to Disney World.
title: First Disney Trip
comment: I booked the hotel for its convenient location since I have a 20 month old and this was her first trip to Disney World. Upon arrival the staff I met was very friendly and even though they were extremely busy they had a welcoming attitude which caused a great impression. We spent the next day after our arrival by the pool and ordered from the hotel menu; I have to say I was very dissappointed with the quality of the food, the fries we ordered were extremely oily and the hamburgers tasted horrible, I expected a better quality given the price you pay for food. If you stay at this hotel skip the food and order from delivery.

title: You need a compass / Pets
comment: Overall a very nice place to stay. We arrived very late and there was no one to show us to our room. It is a maze for sure. We finally asked the guard to help us out. It only took us 20 minutes after check in to get to our room. Not every room has a balcony so be sure to request it if you want it and make sure they save it for you. They also allow pets, which we did not know. The room next to us left a small dog and the poor creature barked the entire day and night. We contacted the front desk, but I guess there is only so much they can do. Not to mention that my husband is severely allergic to cats. Had we know animals were allowed we would not have stayed at this hotel.

title: Comfortable & Relaxing
comment: Room was great and bfast buffett was yummy. View is cute and area is adorable, plenty of resturants and shopping close by.

everyoneShouldKnow: Staying on-site at the Swan Dolphin allows you to enjoy many special Disney benefits (available exclusively for guests staying at Walt Disney World hotels) Plus you can walk right into Epcot.
title: Swan and Dolphin
comment: this is a unique hotel for a meeting. Because it's a Disney World Hotel it has a way of making meetings fun.

title: Great hotel Great location
comment: I willd definite stay here again. Hotel was clean, modern and the service was great!

title: Love Belvoirs
comment: Great Hotel..Have stayed here 3 different times..We park our car here for the week while we cruise. Hotel offers Park and Cruise package, which is great, but needs to include breakfast too..Great beds, so comfortable.

title: Great view
comment: Great view of the Marina and it's activities. My son had a great view of the airplanes taking off. It would have been nice if there was a refrigerator and microwave. I thought $22.00 was a little steep for the hotel guest parking. Loved the four pillows on the bed

title: Wonderful staff and great hotel
comment: I was visiting with my sister and daughter to go to Disneyland. The staff was so helpful with the tickets and shuttle to the park. I love that it is not to big, we had a wonderful time. Loved the fitness room and pool and spa. Met some great people also staying there.

everyoneShouldKnow: Rooms are in need of updating, especially funriture and TV/Video quality
title: Room Updates
comment: Rooms are in need of updating and TV/Video system outdated. Internet connection was one of the best and ease of use was appreciated.

title: Front desk manager
comment: I am not sure of the women's name. But she is alway there when I check in around noon-2p on Wednesday's. She is sharpley dressed and I believe is a manager. She is very nice, very accommodating and always has a nice smile. And best of all she remembers you from one week to the next.

title: Unsatisfied
comment: My stay at this facility was not what I have come to expect from Belvoir. Actually this hotel was probably the worst hotel I have ever stayed at. Upon arrival I waited 20 minutes to check in as the person at the front desk did not know how to check someone in and I had to wait for someone that could. On arrival to my floor at around 1900 there were carts and service people everywhere still cleaning rooms. Upon entering my room it was filthy the bathroom was not cleaned it even had a dirty towel in it yet. I ordered room service which took three seperate tries and being connected multiple times and when the food arrived it was horrible. The next morning I ventured for a cup of coffee which was an adventure as the resturant still had the closed sign and I had to ask three different people for assistance s they did not know why it was not open yet only to find later they forgot to change the sign. Upon arrival back to my room that evening I arrived and it still had not been cleaned. I called for room service which arrived an hour later further interupting my day. I wouldnt recommend this property to anyone at all.

title: Too short of a stay!
comment: We had a great time, and can't wait to go back. Floating on the bean bags in the pool was so relaxing and such a great idea! The service was great... and the hotel is located in such a great spot. Everything was perfect. The club lounge was a nice addition.

title: Great Hotel
comment: The staff was very professional the room was amazing.

title: Room smelled of Cigarettes
comment: Standard Belvoir fare. Very friendly staff. Club lounge had hot breakfast (bacon one day, sausage the next, french toast). Room was spacious. Only down side was that teh room reeked of cigarettes. There was copious amounts of fragrance thrown around, but the room still screamed cigarettes.

title: The Best Thing About This Hotel Is.......
comment: The best thing about this hotel is the people that work there!! They always make me feel at home. Let's see...this trip specifically...Bill (manager), Betty (concierge), Kathy (congierge), Pam (bar), Mike (restaurant) and of course, Marie (driver)!!! See you in a few weeks!

title: This Hotel usually meet all our expectations.
comment: I was very disappointed with the bedding. We love the down filled comforters and bedding at Belvoirs. We have stayed at the Atlantic City Convention Center Belvoir on several occasions. We were celebrating our 30th anniversary. The down in the comforters were clumped up and very uncomfortable. I even took pictures if someone would have asked how was my stay, I would have shown them the pictures. No one asked how was your stay Mr. Jones?

title: Beautiful views and great location
comment: My husband and I stayed at the Chicago Belvoir twice. Both times the service was great and the views and location is great. We plan to stay at the Belvoir again.

title: The hotel knows customer service.
comment: Enjoyed our stay, received special attention

title: Sept Stay
comment: Always great stay. Thankful for wonderful breakfast buffet. Fruit is great everytime.

title: Great Stay
comment: This hotel has been recently updated and is a great place to stay. I would definately recommend the upgrade to the club level!.

title: fire alarms
comment: Fire alarms were beeping loud starting at 3 am every hour. could not sleep all night and received no call back from a manager after 3 calls to the front desk. this happened on September 19th

title: OK but not great for a business meeting
comment: I stayed at the Belvoir Premiere for a 2-day business meeting.

everyoneShouldKnow: Excellent service and staff, very friendly and warm environment. I wanted to stay in this hotel forever!
title: Excellent, excellent choice!!
comment: We just came back from Hawaii, I highly recommend this hotel, I just can't say enough about the excellent service we received, every aspect of this hotel is just great!!!.

title: Love this place
comment: I cant wait to go back.This place was so beautiful inside and out. All the employees and I mean ALL the employees were really hospitable. Dont forget to ride the little boat they have.

title: Room is getting old
comment: Had to attend a business meeting so chose a base room. Peeling paint, cracked and faded bathroom counter, chipped and cracked room desk and closet door,falling off of tracks is what I got. Bed too soft finished it off.

title: This hotel has friendly and courteous staff
comment: I have stayed at this hotel a number of times and continue to return based upon convenience and the helpful, courteous staff who go out of their way to assist in making my stay a great experience. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Services
comment: The waste basket in the bathroom was sitting on top of the closed toilet seat. Is that nomal?

everyoneShouldKnow: It is so spacious and the surrounding nature is astoundingly beautiful.
title: I WILL be coming back!
comment: Planning our Hawaii trip was so stressful, with all the options we got overwhelmed, but I'm glad that we finally selected the Belvoir in Kona. Such a great decision! My Nana and I had many many remarks about how spacious it is at this hotel, it is like the space took a giant inhalation and has suspended itself in time. If you love the water, this place is for you! I took the trolley many of our snorkeling, snuba, and swimming adventures. There is also a pier in walking distance away where you can hop on a boat to go out to great snorkeling spots, rent a kayak, or a paddleboard. The free breakfast was one of my favorite reasons for being here. And the beds were wonderful, I overheard other guests saying this too. The staff was so kind!! And the pools are beautiful. Once I saw dolphins in the ocean as I was walking around the spacious, beautiful gardens right next to the pool. This is a great spot! The trolley was really nice too. We were there for a week without renting a car, but after 1 week it seems like a car is needed. I had a great time at this place =. There are many events in the mornings, like hula lessons and yoga. Once I walked around the lava rocks in the morning, at the edge of the ocean just outside of the hotel, and there is so much life there!! It was beautiful. Beautiful beautiful beautiful. Oh! If you can, visit the fern rainforest and lava tube, it is on the other side of the island, but definitely worth the trip.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great view in pool and kind service
title: Belvoir Waikiki has great view and service.
comment: Actually, I surprised that there was not a toothbrush and razor in my room. and I waited to clean my room until 3AM. so I decided to go tour of Hawaii and arrived back in 11AM. But my second day, I surprised seascape from pool is very great and kind service of lobby's manager. And I had a good time in VIP louge in 31 floor of Belvoir in the evening. I was so happy that my wife satisfied your hotel. because I decided to staty Belvoir altough my wife worried about expensive price. I knew the reason many people recommend to stay Belvoir to me.

everyoneShouldKnow: Parking at the hotel is terrible.
title: Parking garage is the worst
comment: If your travel to Honolulu does not involve use of an automobile, then the Belvoir Princess is okay--not great, but fair. Staff is polite and helpful, rooms are small but tolerable if you are on a budget, food is quite expensive--lots of better restaurant choices. BUT--if you have a rental (or borrowed) car, forget the Belvoir Princess!! The parking garage is a hopeless maze, and if you have any problems with stairs then don't even bother. The low point of our stay in Honolulu was the SP garage. I suggest you go elsewhere.

title: Great facility but staff needs work
comment: The property is beautiful and the room had a wonderful view of the Coronado bridge and downtown. The room was clean and comfortable, however, the staff is well below Grandbourne standards.
