I checked in early and they were to call me on my cell when my room was ready. Several hours later I checked at the desk and the room was ready but no one ever called. The staff did not go over any Gold options, did not explain the Wi-Fi (some Belvoir's you have an access code other you just log on and hope the bill is credited), did not offer a 4:00 PM checkout and when I went to use the Club Room my key was not programmed for access requiring an additional trip to the desk. When I went to check my bags while I was waiting for my room the two people at the bell desk sat there and talked about work for five minutes while I waited. I know it was five minutes as by then I was curious to see how inattentive this staff could be so I was looking at my watch. Now I just checked my personal credit card (the one on my profile) and they charged my stay on that card and not the card I presented at check-in although the room was not a prepay. I now must attempt to credit one card and charge the other (Grandbourne billing is another nightmare as I'm still waiting for a call regarding a stay in August). The upside is I lived in San Diego for eight years and the renovation of the property was excellent as I know what it used to look like. Honestly, I would stay there again as the views and room were wonderful but don't expect Grandbourne standards with the staff.

title: Nice hotel
comment: on our hawaiian honeymoon vacation we spent 4nights in the Belvoir Kauai. It was a nice hotel. We loved the restaurant and the fires outside. But in general it was too big, and the pool was quite small for such a big hotel. Unfortunately the waves were pretty dangerous at the beach. We did like that there were washing machines in each building to use against some quarters.

title: I enjoy staying at this hotel
comment: The staff at this hotel is friendly and efficient. I had a problem with the AC; the problem was handled quickly.

title: Second Visit
comment: My Wife and I stayed at the Carlsbad Belvoir last year and enjoyed it so much that we came back this year, and once again we enjoyed ourselves. The staff are very helpful, the property is of a very high quality, and is ideally located for either staying on site or exploring the area. My only issue was that the Club Lounge no longer exists, and the Platinum breakfast arrangements are a little confusing at first. The dining room staff were kind enough to explain, and rectify the confusion. Our stay was very enjoyable, and I would not hesitate to stay again or highly recommend the hotel.

title: Great hotel
comment: Everything was very good or great except the shower in the accessible room I had. Water got all over the floor due to poor design and the hand held shower did not work properly.

title: Have stayed in better
comment: I wasn't impressed. The rooms were tiny, bathrooms even smaller. Its inconvenient to to between rooms because you have to go down then walk across the lobby, hop on another elevator and go back up. I had the worst time booking my reservation and it didn't even get right until I complained at check out.

everyoneShouldKnow: Excessive cost for food and drinks... bring a jacket ... its cold
title: Dolphin and Convention center
comment: I was at the Dolphin for a convention. The room was OK but nothing special. The prices in the hotel were excessive and many convention attendees complained about the cost of everything.

title: room mix up
comment: I booked three rooms almost a month before the visit ( Sept 20) and asked that they be on the same floor. I even got to the hotel early and re inforeced this request in person with the clerk behind the desk. I was discouraged that one of the rooms was not on the same floor

title: under const remodel
comment: The hotel was under construction during my visit. They did an exceptional job of keeping the construction from upsetting my stay. The gym is one of the best I have used at a hotel in some time. I travel 150+ nights per year.

everyoneShouldKnow: high level of focus on service.
title: thank you
comment: Thanks for the great service. I was here for a conference and was really delighted with the service and special attention.

everyoneShouldKnow: location is great for visiting colleges
title: Collaboration and customer service
comment: I was particularly impressed by everyone stepping up. for example, when I needed to check my luggage and there was no bell captain, someone from the desk assisted. In addition, when I went to retrieve the luggage, a housekeeper jumped to help me. Great customer service.

title: Overall Great Stay
comment: I stayed at the Belvoir downtown for a work event and was very impressed but the helpfullness of the staff. Everyone was warm and friendly and always helped me in whatever way they could. I also hosted a work even in the Oculus and it was beautiful. LeAnn was a doll to work with. Would stay here again for business or pleasure.

title: Hotels to Avoid
comment: Charging for wfi in the room is tacky and not done by many of your peers. $4 for an ice tea.....really especially when the wait staff is so poorly trained

title: Chief EMS VAMC
comment: The restroom had a lot BM on the stool when I checked in and the floor had hair in the corners. There was no coffee by the coffee pot. There was no complimentary coffee at the front desk. There was no newspaper at the door every morning like many hotels offer. The front desk was not helpful at all for the events that were going on for the AHE conferences. Elevators were very confusing had to be on a specific elevator in order to get to the 20th floor. The bar lounge was very small so most folks went to the bar accrpss the street as there was more room.

everyoneShouldKnow: Within walking distance of the convention center. Not many restraunts nearby.
title: Excellent hotel
comment: I really enjoyed my stay here. The only concern I had was that the guest rooms were not wireless. In order to access the internet from your hotel room, guests are required to pay $14.95 for 24 hrs of internet service. In order to not pay this additional fee, guests are welcome to use the wireless in the hotel lobby or use their Internet Cafe. I thought that was awkward while trying to do work business.

everyoneShouldKnow: surprisingly quiet even though it is right in the middle of a college campus
title: First time stay
comment: I was pleasantly surprised by the comfort of the bed and the pillows and by the fact that there were blankets on the bed that kept me warm. The room was spacious and clean and given that this was located on a college campus it was surprisingly quiet. I would absolutely stay there again and would stay at the hotel line again after this fantastic experience!

title: Great
comment: The hotel staff was great especially the front desk, received many upgrades, newspaper, breakfast, shuttle, great room, the bed was heavenly, the service overall was great.

everyoneShouldKnow: very close to all the action downtown
title: Close to the action
comment: Very nice place and within walking distance to all the action!

title: this hotel is very well located
comment: This hotel is very convenient to me because what it offers and the location.

title: Went for a meeting///
comment: and enjoyed my stay...only thing I would change would be put coffee out for early risers (east coasters). It is in the room...but some in the lobby would be nice...Starbucks opens at 6:00 but many were in your lobby from 4:00 on...

title: Good Visit
comment: The room was very spacious, clean and comfortable. But the real value was when I needed to print three pages for a presentation. This is one of the few hotels that offers free printing in the lobby. What a lifesaver. Thank you!

title: Wonderful Staff
comment: Everyone at this hotel seems dedicated to insuring one's stay is perfect. Great location, excellent restaurant makes staying here convenient and enjoyable. Would recommend this facility for all business and vacation travelers.

title: Need some changes
comment: There needs to be free wireless in the rooms. For business travel this is a must - should NOT charge for this service. The hallways were not very clean. The staff were very helpful

title: Staff was Wonderful!
comment: We had a very terrific stay. Two staff members stood out.. Emma at the registration desk and Annibal at the guest services desk.

everyoneShouldKnow: Nice service...shuttle and parking staff are awesome!
title: Great overflow hotel
comment: This hotel was used as an overflow hotel bc the one for our meeting was booked. It was wonderful! Clean, fast, friendly, and a great shuttle service.

everyoneShouldKnow: It refurbished and is fabulous! Great location and view from 33rd floor!
title: The view was breath taking! I loved the refurbished room. It was so inviting!
comment: Great remodel. Loved the location easy access to everything! Very comfortable and inviting!

title: Great Perks
comment: I had a great time. The continental breakfast and appetizer hour were excellent!

title: good location
comment: room needed update. otherwise, good stay. Fitness center has been upgraded.

title: Executive wing is very quiet and comfortable.
comment: I appreciated the quietness of the executive wing of the hotel, which is where my room was located. It was still convenient to the rest of the hotel and the adjoining convention center.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location and warm and friendly people.
title: Excellent Stay in Denver
comment: I had a great stay at your hotel, wish that your restaurant was open, but still highly recommended.

title: Super fabulous!!
comment: We stayed here for our honeymoon and our room and the hotel were the best part about our trip! Sissy said "I have upgraded you because of your status to the best room available." SHE WAS NOT LYING! It was gorgeous and everything we could have wanted for the most amazing week of our lives!

everyoneShouldKnow: It has wonderful Staff for the Guest
title: Wonderful staff
comment: My stay was wonderful Jeff was a wonderful help to my family he is an excellent person with and wonderful attitude I wish there were more people like Jeff and oh yes Nick was excellent as well.

title: Catatonic
comment: Great location. Clean, friendly

title: This hotel is barely average
comment: The flying of the colors (flag) was very derespectful to veterans that serve and have served this country. The flag was dirty and torn. When requested to replace it, it took several days before someone responded. Some of the staff was unfriendly, there wasn't adequate place to eat nearby, other than the mall across the street, and the food there was not very good.

everyoneShouldKnow: The restruarnt was very slow and way over priced.
title: Great Location - Slow Resturant over priced
comment: The hotel has a great location but had lunch and it took forever to get our food. Then had breakfast the next day and the cost of the buffett was like eating a dinner way over priced. Be careful.

title: Lobby Redesign
comment: Looks great but need to fix the seating in the bar. Not sure how this large of an investment could overlook the wrong size height on bar stools ... otherwise very fresh and classic.

title: Great Hotel
comment: Nice hotel, emploeyee and location. Enjoyed the club level, great food and service.

everyoneShouldKnow: the hotel is under renovation. The hotel waited to long to begin the renovation.....it needs more than average amount of work to meet expectations.
title: Senior Director
comment: Elevators were very slow, had to wait 5 to 10 mins. Food in rest. was very average. Carpet was torn and thread bearing. Paint on room door was chipped. Stains on carpet. Staff was excellent though.

everyoneShouldKnow: Bring your food and running shoes with you.
title: Very nice room, but it ends there
comment: I stayed four nights at this hotel and felt the room was quite nice, very clean and fairly quiet. The large flat screen TV worked well and had several clear channels. The WiFi was solid. Unfortunately, the other hotel amenities fell short. I tried to eat at the in-hotel restaurant a couple of times and the wait staff was MIA, so I went elsewhere. The club lounge had very slow food service as well. In the morning, they were to open at 6:30 and often 30+ minutes later, the hot food was yet to be offered. Likewise, in the evening, the club lounge was to be open until 7:30. Little was left by 7pm and it was not restocked. The workout facility was off site and not convenient to use.

title: Excellent location
comment: The location was the basis for my stay. walking distance of the convention center. finish the activity and walk to the hotel, it takes 3-5 minutes to arrive. I recommend it!!!

title: Clean hotel
comment: Clean hotel and friendly service.

title: Belvoir Indianapolis
comment: I have stayed in this facility a couple of times and am never disappointed in the cleanliness and friendliness of the staff. This facility is centrally located to many attractions and within walking distance of shopping and eating establishments.

title: Needs Updated
comment: No TV remote. Light by bed you had to plug and unplug to operate. Room temperature control not working. Call room services and was unable to fix problems with room.

title: Hotel has great features
comment: The staff was very helpful and kind. The room was very clean and comfortable. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

everyoneShouldKnow: So close to the outlets, restaurants, and easily assessible for conventions
title: Just what I was looking for
comment: I called the night before and was offered a great rate, checked in & the front desk was so accommodating, loved the view from our room, thought it was very clean & comfortable, ammenities all there.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is very helpful and goes above and beyound to try and help in any way they can.
title: Birthday Weekend
comment: My family and I atayed this past weekend (Sept.21-Sept.23). We came up for my 10 year old son's birthyday. When we arrived, a bellman was outside and ready to help with our bags. Once I went in to check into the room, the staff had a very pleasent attitude. They were very helpful, and went above and beyound to meet your needs. We had a little problem with the TV in our first room, but they quicky moved us to another one. I would definitly come back to this hotel and tell all my friends and family about. Next time I come back it's just going to be a weekend for my husband and I.

title: Misleading
comment: I was offered the opportunity to not have my room serviced for a $5 a day coupon to use within the hotel... What they didn't tell me was you can't use it at the convenience store or the bar... they only 2 places I wanted to use it.. Highly misleading

title: Wonderful!
comment: A lovely hotel. Well marked, with convenient parking. Rooms clean, modern and nicely decorated. I was not able to stay for the complimentary breakfast.

everyoneShouldKnow: hotel and staff is first class.
title: great hotel
comment: not enough wall outlets..

title: Pleasant Surprises In an Airport Hotel
comment: I knew this was an older property, so I wasn't expecting much. Wrong! The staff cares, the rooms are large, comfortable and the BPG lounge nice and well appointed. The connectivity works everywhere and they validate your parking, so it's free (which has most of the other local properties beat.)

title: Wonderful Hotel
comment: The staff were very egar to help with any of you needs or concerns. The rooms are wonderful. Would stay here anytime.

title: Overall good
comment: Overall the stay was good. The only problems was with the restroom. The sink did not drain correctly and the toilet was very slow to flush. Also the bathtub was dirty. Looked like it has not been cleaned for awhile.

title: you have a rude manager
comment: stay excellent, had park and fly rate. on return trip shuttle didn't show up for 45 minutes took a taxi to hotel. when i asked manager about shuttle he was very rude and informed me the shuttle had run every 15 minutes. stay at Belvoir several times a year and have never met a more rude young man

title: InnerHarbor
comment: Location near the light rail and other attractions is a big plus. Beds are super comfortable. Staff is very friendly and know their job.

title: Hotel Review
comment: This was a great stay for the evening. We enjoyed the Club Level lounge. The place was very quiet and clean.

title: Love the hotel, breakfast was a problem
comment: The hotel is clean and we felt well taken care of until breakfast. After having to tell someone that our order hadn't been taken we received luke warm coffee, and the "warm ups" were also luke warm. My husband asked for no butter on his pancakes, he got butter. Syrup was served cold. I ordered fruit, yogurt and granola parfait and a side of hash browns. There was no granola in the parfait and I didn't recieve any hash browns. We also noticed that there was a buffet in the back room after we'd ordered. Wish someone had mentioned that, we could have picked our own meal and avoided all the problems.

title: Good accomodations
comment: When most other places in downtown Philly were booked, I was able toget a room. A little pricey as it was Club Level but accomdations were great. Room was very comfortable. Only compalints were noise from doors/flushes and people in next door room. fortunately quited down later in the evening. Although there are many nice restaurants nearby, the lobby restaurant had a very limited menu.

title: Meticulous attention to (your) details
comment: The service I had (9/19-21) included a few housekeeping details that only a keen eye could have picked up on. My need for a new water, an extra coffee package based on my usage, leaving certain items untouched while straightening out others... I could go on. Also, a woman named Anne at the BPG desk that appears to read minds, and failing that was a very good listener as well. Wonderful stay; professional staff. Good job all 'round.

title: Bad experience
comment: Front desk was not helpful and said they had to check with the manager on certain requirements. Manager was not avaialbe for 24 hours and then a day later received a message saying they were out for 2 days. No follow-up to complaint. DID NOT EXPECT THIS BAD A SERVICE FROM Belvoir STONEBRIAR.

everyoneShouldKnow: Big, clean and quiet rooms. Very cozy,
title: Nice rooms and love shuttle service
comment: We stayed at this hotel in mid Sept to go to Disneyland. It was great to just take the shuttle there and back. It came frequently and so so convenient! Nice pool and the rooms were spacious and had coffee and wifi. I would go back there again.

title: Facilities are ok, staff was not
comment: I got one of the newly renovated rooms so the room was very nice. A couple of things:

title: Comfortable bed, great room
comment: Excellent room! We had a corner room with a view of the city from every angle. The staff was helpful and friendly.

title: Choice Program
comment: My suggestion would be to provide trash bags, bigger trash cans or staff to empty trash cans.

everyoneShouldKnow: Comfortable, freindly and close to Universal Studio City and the beds were super comfortable
title: Nice Stay
comment: The hotel was excellent, great services, friendly environment, helpful staff and close to the Universal City Night Life

title: Business Visit
comment: Hotels in DC were booked and this was good alternative for midway between airport and DC. Airport shuttle was very convenient. Too bad pool, spa and fitness were under construction, but didn't have any free time to enjoy temporary workout room (which seemed OK).

everyoneShouldKnow: There are better hotels in downtown Philly. This is not one of them.
title: Wait for the refurbish to complete
comment: I heard late night construction and trucks dropping off supplies at night. Not a restful night. The lack of food service past 11:00pm is a crime against business travelers. I arrived @ 11:30pm after an airline delay and found myself having to scrounge through local pizza shops and Chinese food shops that woudl deliver late. No room service. During the day, food service was limited to the lounge and its very limited menu. The fitness center was great but the rest of the hotel was very low budget -- not a fair exchange for the room rate.

title: Great Place to Stay
comment: I would recommend this hotel to my family and friends. The room was very, very clean. Everything in the room looked new. The bed was very comfortable and those were probably the best and fluffiest pillows I have ever slept on. I stayed there during the week and while there were other guests on my floor the hotel was very quiet. The staff was friendly and courteous. The location was great, close to plenty of places to eat and shop. Although it was not located downtown, where the convention I was attending was being held, it was less than ten minutes away and the main road led right to downtown. I would stay there again.

everyoneShouldKnow: The Location is excellent. It is located off Route 50/301 and is directly across the road from Annapolis Mall and has several wonderful restaurants that are within walking distance.
title: Excellent Location
comment: The Location is excellent. It is located off Route 50/301 and is directly across the road from Annapolis Mall and has several wonderful restaurants that are within walking distance.

everyoneShouldKnow: Wonderful People working the club lounge.
title: Great; but please correct my bill!
comment: A favorite hotel of mine but the desk clerk was uninterested in correcting the error on my room bill. Quite surprising for a Grandbourne property.

title: Great front desk staff
comment: The staff at the front desk were very cheerful and helpful, much appreciated in the midst of business travels.

title: Hotel has great customer service
comment: Hotel has great customer service

everyoneShouldKnow: Fun, relaxing and the location is great.
title: Family Fun
comment: The Belvoir Waikiki Resort Hotel is the place to stay on family vacations.

title: WOW Service
comment: I cannot say enough great things about your Sunday afternoon concierge(I apologize I did not get his name) to the Club Lounge staff of Alisa, Jose and Albin among others. We have traveled for over 30 years and never had this great of an entire staff! We had reservations to return to the area at a different hotel later next month and I immediately changed our reservations so we can make a return visit here. Kudos to everyone there. We look forward to many return visits.

everyoneShouldKnow: Close to shore, lots of places to eat and shop nearby
title: Great Location for Jersey Shore goers
comment: We have been coming to this hotel for many years several times a summer to enjoy the Jersey Shore without the headache of driving back and forth for day trips. The updates to the hotel were much needed and the club lounge is so much better. There is still room for improvement especially the pool and hot tub. The floor is very slippery and always has water on it probably due to the poor drainage. Drains are clogged and we even saw maintainace push water into the hot tub (disgusting). The pool needed to be warmer- was very cold - if they wanted to keep the outdoor pool open which is connecting then they have to heat it!!! We were unable to enjoy the pool this trip. Also, front desk staff could be nicer and recognize that we come to this hotel often and are gold level BPG.

title: Poor value, felt well short of expectations
comment: Fell short on the following:

everyoneShouldKnow: It's a convenient on/off the highway. All of the bartenders we've encountered at Shula's are really friendly and helpful.
title: Bathrooms need an update
comment: The main room was as expected however the bath area needs an update (tub was also dirty). The tiles need regrouting and the tub is old and beat up. The front desk asked if everything was satisfactory at checkout and I told them about the dirty tub and they tried to compensate me for it.

title: Great Seattle Location
comment: Hotel is conveniently located. Easily able to walk to Pike Market and surrounding shops and restaurants.

title: Average service
comment: The hotel is standard but I very dissatisfied with the service of the staff. Two nights in a row I asked for silverware for the some food that I had bought in and it took them an hour on both occasions. But when I ordered room service, they brought the food out in a reasonable time. Just because I didn't buy food from their in-room dining they made me wait an hour to get a pair of silverware.

everyoneShouldKnow: Be sure to bring your confirmation with you and insist that you are given the room category reserved.
title: You Gave me the WRONG room
comment: I made my reservation three months prior to my arrival. I booked and received confirmation of a room in the main tower. When I checked in, I was given a room which could not have been farther from the main building. I was in a different zip code. They tried to tell me that they were all booked up in the main building. Since I made my reservation three months in advance, why wasn't one of the rooms held for my arrival? They tried various excuses and finally reduced my rate for my stay. I was not pleased that the location of the room I reserved was not available. Was I treated this way because I was a AAA member, at their special low rate? Who knows.

title: Near the Airport
comment: near airport. Phone did not work at all.

title: Good Not Great
comment: Overall, solid hotel and staff. Areas for improvement:

title: Inconsistent .. poor customer service
comment: I stayed at this property several times this year, service has been inconsistent at best. On my last stay it turned from inconsistent to rude ..

title: Shuttle Service
comment: You need better communication between your switchboard and shuttle service. I had to call 2 or 3 times every day and was always waiting 1 - 1 1/2 hours for shuttle service. This should never have happened and I was always told the switchboard did not tell them.

title: Not upto Belvoir standards
comment: The room, amenities and cleanliness are not up Belvoir Standards. Customer service is indifferent.

title: Very average
comment: The hotel has a great location, and is very much in demand for conventions. There are two large towers and the elevator, at least in the south tower, took forever. Of the five elevators, two were out of service and one was reserved for staff for the four nights I was there. The housekeeping staff were even using the public elevators. Although the fitness facilities are excellent, the rooms are very dated and in need of a makeover. The bathroom looked like something fromt he early 80's, complete with pink tile. The bathroom could have been cleaner and the furniture in the room was threadbare and worn. Check is was genuinely disinterested in explaining BPG Gold benefits (or even directing me to the elevator).

title: Beutiful place
comment: I love the look of the hotel it was beautiful,the prices on the food were a little high but th whole experince was real good

title: Great Value
comment: For the frequent business traveler going through FLL for any reason, the Belvoir is a great choice. I spend as much time here as any hotel in the area and they never dissappoint. On my most recent trip they upgraded me to a bi-level suite and provided a food voucher in light of the Club room being closed on a Sunday. The staff is courteous and considerate in all matters.

title: Best value in NY Metropolitan Area
comment: If you're staying in the NY/NJ area on business or pleasure, this hotel has everything you will need. Proximity to the city and all major sporting events, plus easy highway access.

title: Nice place on the bay
comment: A nice hotel under the Belvoir brand. The facilities are on par for the category. The food service in teh sports bar leaves somehting to be desired. apparently al of teh cooking is done in a common kitchen so the ticket times are longer than you'd expect. Not something they warn you about prior to ordering.

everyoneShouldKnow: Walking distance to the Rangers and Cowboys games!
title: Great for Cowboys game
comment: The Belvoir Arlington was a great place to stay for the Cowboys games. It's located within walking distance to the Cowboys and Rangers game, meaning no parking fees. All kinds of restaurants are just minutes away. The pool area is exceptional and unique. The hotel bar is larger than most hotel bars and one of the few that has several TVs to catch your favorite game on. The lobby is immaculate and includes Starbucks and Pizza Hut items. The room was clean and the bed was great. The carpet could use an upgrade in the near future but overall, I will stay there again for my next game. You just can't beat the convenience.

title: Great location and features
comment: The Belvoir in University City Philadelphia is a clean, comfortable hotel with lots of amenities. The fitness center is clean and the hotel location is great with many activities and restaurants near by.

everyoneShouldKnow: You will enjoy a clean, comfortable room and quite corridors.
title: Very convenient location
comment: This hotel is conveniently located in the Towson area close to shopping, restaurants, and many colleges/universities. The staff were wonderful and courteous, rooms were comfortable and spotless. A nice touch to have a complimentary bottle of spring water in the room awaiting you. On our past visits parking was included; currently it is not.

title: great staff!
comment: Loved the staff and the beds were incredibly comfortable.

title: Wonderful resort & staff!
comment: We really enjoyed our stay at the Wild Horse resort, the staff really went above and beyond and they were always willing to pleasantly help our whole family. It is one of our favorite resorts! We had a great time on the boat ride and at Rawhide!

title: Odd hotel, poor suite layout
comment: Love denver and good location but suites are not well laid out. Small bathroom in the middle separating bedroom and living room.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location for both Stanford and downtown Palo Alto
title: Good stay
comment: Good stay. The Westin is my first choice for Grandbourne properties in Palo Alto, but with Stanford students returning and Dreamforce filling up all hotels in the area, I was lucky to get a room here.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location, within walking distance of everything, and outstanding staff.
title: A Grand Old Hotel
comment: If you are looking for a new, modern hotel, this is not the place to stay. If you love warmth, character and charm, you will find it here! From the moment that you walk in the door it is like a step back in time. All of the original Walnut paneling and woodwork are beautifully preserved. Staff is outstanding, especially in the club room. Pool was closed for remodeling, but did not have time to use it anyway,

everyoneShouldKnow: I was very unhappy with everything
title: Horrible
comment: I paid extra money to get the club lounge suite for my fianc饳 birthday. We walk in room, looks nothing like pictures on website. Stains all over carpet, comforter on bed was dirty, found dead bugs on bathroom counter. Door knob in bathroom was about to fall apart. Looks like someone did pull ups on rod for shower curtain one side was pulled from tile. The club lounge had very little selection when stocked at all. I needed extra bath towel I called front desk and 45 min later almost check out time the towel was delivered to my room. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone save yourself a lot of money and go somewhere anywhere else. And to top it off I got my email of final folio saying I owed no additional cost which I shouldn't have anAd my credit card is showing they charged additional 56.64 so I will have to call and find out what now. Oh and after all it cost to stay there which is not worth it at all you have to pay additional 18 dollars to park

title: Great location, friendly staff!
comment: I was recomended to stay at this location.

title: Above and beyond...
comment: We are local residents, so when our plans to go elsewhere fell through at the last minute, we decided to give the Belvoir at Sand Key a try since we love the location. The staff went above and beyond our expectations when they discovered it was a special occasion, they took care of us like no one else could. We loved every minute of it and we will definitely be back in the future. Thank you to the front desk and the rest of the Belvoir staff for a memorable stay!

everyoneShouldKnow: Too much money for lousy service.
title: Spider webs on balconies
comment: we rented two balcony rooms paying extra. However the balconies were full of spider webs and after we asked to have them cleaned nobody responded. we also requested rooms as close as possible to elevator and on a high floor.....but instead got room that were so far from the elevator that if you forgot something it was better to re-buy it at a park then walk all the way back. It was a real drag having that situation with 2 small kids. The rooms were also below the lobby level....so much for paying extra an booking directly with the hotel. The person at the front gave us these rooms even though we arrived mid-week and the hotel looked half-empty. This was our last stay at this hotel. We have been there 4 previous times, but this was the last.

title: Overalla service
comment: Excellent service and roon very friendly

title: Wedding stay
comment: I stayed at this hotel for a friends wedding. I thought the hotel was very clean and enjoyed the layout of the room. Bathroom was designed well, and loved the fact that there was a power strip in the closet which made plugging in the iron quick and easy.

everyoneShouldKnow: That they are all suites with lots of room and with the comfort of home.
title: Outstanding
comment: I am a flight attendant for a major airline for 24 years, and I have stayed in a lot of hotels over the years. Some were good and some not so good. I commute from CO and work out of Chicago therefore when I stay in hotels in Chicago it is at my expense. So I always look for good deals.

everyoneShouldKnow: Weekends party in the street a little noisy until about 11 PM
title: Good stay, late Club breakfast
comment: Good stay, rug in room a bit stained. Ate old leftover bagel because Club breakfast did not arrive for 20 minutes after opening. Prep staff should be there early enough to have most breakfast available at club opening. Otherwise hotel meets BPG/Belvoir standards.

title: Ok, But
comment: Parking situation is expensive and makes the total cost of stay high enough to consider not staying at this hotel next time.

everyoneShouldKnow: Clean, comfortable, great location, fab staff!
title: Amazing hotel in perfect location
comment: This hotel exceeded our expectations! From the minute you enter the front door you feel at home. The lobby is beautiful & comfortable. Fresh fruit, pretzles or cookies are a real treat! The front desk staff are professional & warm. Mathew K. went way above the call of duty to make my husbands birthday special. The room & bedding were fabulous! We will be back to Philly & would not stay anywhere else!

title: Belvoir Ft. Lauderdale beach
comment: We had a great stay at te Belvoir, the staff were very friendly and helpful, our room was very well presented and room service was prompt with food at a high standard.

title: ideal feet in the sand location
comment: Location was the big sell here. Hotel was pleasant, with a great view of the sand! I will stay here again. The resturant was primarily "Mexican" however many other's in walking distance nearby.

everyoneShouldKnow: You will be well received and Club Level Service options are Exceptional.
title: An Attitude To Serve!!
comment: We were greeted and welcomed by the Valet Attendant| Doorman. His name losses me, but his mannerisms and etiquette(s) were well received by my wife and our two young boys. Upon check-in we received our room registration keys and our "BPG Welcome Letter". Our room was appointed and met our level of comfort. On the next morning my wife inquired about the "Grandbourne Gym-In-The-Bag" as advertised on the hotel information screen. She placed a call to the Sunday AM Front Desk Agent, but they did not know what was "Gym-In-The-Bag". The front desk supervisor did not know about this particular service or option, but extended her an invite to use the gym facilities. The Club Level Breakfast was hosted by Ms. Monique, a hospitality professional with personality and a friendly touch. Food was hot, well stocked, beverages were refreshing and plentiful. We sat in the overflow in the front of the room and enjoyed the spacious and cushioned seating on the chairs and couch. Check-out was Great! Called for valet and the same gentleman who name I can not recall, Was Back On-Duty. My two young boys were as excited as I was to see him return to check us out. He called prior to his arrival to check to see if we were ready to receive him. That was Just the WOW Factor you can appreciate from a service provider. An we showed our appreciation when he assisted us to our vehicle. THANK YOU Belvoir for An Attitude of Serve!!

title: Great location, great acommodations
comment: Belvoir always offers excellent locations, normal expected support and a great staff. They have done a great job updating the facility. The only complaint is the internet was a bit slow and the elevator was a bit stuffy. Overall, I would go back.

everyoneShouldKnow: The pool is awesome. It's got the right mix of kid stuff versus adult entertainment.
title: Great Disney Off site Hotel
comment: I love staying here when I travel to Orlando. It's even better after the renovation. The beds are always comfortable and the pool area ROCKS. Thanks for a great stay once again.

title: Great weekend getaway
comment: Booked last minute for a weekend getaway and was very pleased with the location and the newly refurbished room. The concierge was very helpful securing a reservation allowing us to enjoy a nice dinner before catching our train. Only complaint is that the hotel charged $3.25 per bag to hold our luggage for the afternoon once you check out. Of all the hotels I have ever patronized, the Belvoir is the only once to levy such a fee. It struck me as a very "bush-league" as I have generally found Grandbourne to be an outstanding company. That being said I would return in the future if my travels bring me to the Big Apple.

title: Good Experience
comment: We were surprised to be in the Executive Wing when checking in, the room was clean, quiet and the bed was very comfortable. I would reccommend this hotel location to friends.

everyoneShouldKnow: For a few additional $$$ the Club Lounge is a great deal.
title: Try the Club Lounge
comment: I was in town for a conference (at another hotel) but selected Belvoir because I had accumulated enough BPG points for a free night. Belvoir was promoting their Club Lounge so I gave it a try. I was NOT disappointed. We were given a room on the 29th floor overlooking the Charles River. The Club Lounge was open all day with snacks and drinks and even included breakfast and (heavy) hors d'oeuvres each day.

everyoneShouldKnow: Ideally located in midtown, just came off a massive renovation - all rooms are like brand new!
title: Excellent location!
comment: I stayed for one night at the Belvoir Hotel NY with a friend and had an excellent stay. My room was ready when I arrived and I was given exactly what I needed. The staff is always very nice and accommodating, especially Lazaro at the Concierge Desk. He is incredibly helpful and quite knowledgeable about the city.

everyoneShouldKnow: Hotel are very clean and comfortable
title: Pagano and Smith Wedding
comment: Great and comfortable bed

title: Needs updating and cleaning
comment: Location is great, food in the restaurants is great, people are friendly but the hotel is tired and run down. The day to day maintanence and cleaning is poor. There were stains and dirt on the carpet in the halls and the room. There were water stains on the ceiling and paint and wallpaper peeling in the bathroom. The sofa was so stained and old that I did not touch it. The lobby is worn and tired looking.

title: Location, Facilities & PlatinumRecognition
comment: I had a good stay at the Belvoir NY (at 7th Ave & 52nd St) with a minor snafu. I'd stay here again.

title: Waterside upholds excellent standards of Grandbourne
comment: Waterside is located in an area of restaurants, shopping, and tours on Navy ships. Very pleasant! Staff is VERY helpful -- especially with personal request we made. Only one problem -- wi-fi in the rooms. Internet in the lobby was sketchy at best and not convenient. Today's guests travel with laptops!

title: The staff tried....
comment: Checked in late, real late, after 2 am. Booked a "suite" online, was informed there were no suites at checkin. Offered a "comp" roll-away, but that was not what I was looking for. Felt kind of jilted by the comp offer being that I am a plat status.

title: Nice property great service
comment: Decent location in NJ, easy access to all of the local areas. Club level room was very large, and nicely appointed. Laundry was relatively cheap by hotel comparisons.

title: OUR STAY 9/20-9/22
comment: Our room was great-with a spectacular view. The staff was very friendly, and we had our three year old daughter with us and they were very understanding with her needs as well.

title: friendly staff
comment: work hard to meet your every need

title: Great place to stay!
comment: This hotel is so clean and smelling good! Nice room with the view and clean scented bedsheets, definitely will come back here on my next trip to LA!

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is the best, and the location can't be beat.
title: Fantastic
comment: The front desk staff was fantastic; I dont remember the name of the young man who checked me in made me really feel welcome. The location is awesome; the view of Manhattan is lovely.

title: Great location
comment: This hotel is easy to navigate, from the garage level to the restaurants to the town itself. The staff if helpful, the gym is nicely equipped. The club level is so nice for breakfast. The elevators were a bit slow, but that made for good conversation with fellow travelers. We will check in here again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Just one? Since service can very with personnel changes, I will go with location, location, location.
title: Fabulous Stay
comment: Club Lounge a great perk and worth the extra expense especially when you have people like Connie and Rene working there. They didn't just tend to the food and beverage, they tended to us making our stay great.

title: Great service but rooms are outdated
comment: The hotel and the rooms are somewhat updated. However the staff was amazing.

title: Friendly and helpful staff
comment: On early arrival we were greeted by Nicole who advised us our room did not appear to be ready but she would check.

everyoneShouldKnow: Had a great office area in my suite.
title: tampa airport Belvoir suits
comment: I abtained my reservation through a discount service and figured i would get a left over room. My suit was spacous, clean, quiet and well equipted. It was a wonderfull suprise. The bed was great. Sleeped like a baby. I would stay there again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location for Metlife Stadium events.
title: Great location/hotel for stadium events
comment: The staff was extremely professional and friendly. Great customer service. Hotel can use some decor updating, but is very nice and clean! Great hotel when attending events at Metlife Stadium.

title: Great Rooms
comment: I stayed in a room with a separate living area and king size bed. The room was very nice and quite large.

title: City of Brotherly Love???
comment: The rooms were clean and comfortable, but the front desk staff were rude. I would not recommend this hotel and next time I'm in Philadelphia, will shop around a little more for better customer service.

title: My Favorite NYC Hotel
comment: This is my absolute favorite NYC hotel, easy access to NY, the free hotel shuttle makes it easy for me to take the 5 min train ride to Penn Station. The staff is very friendly.

title: Great Stay
comment: The staff was excellent and took care of all my needs without hesitation. I was very impressed. I do recommend you request to stay in the tower...the rooms are newer with better views.

title: Hotel needs a refurbish
comment: Although the hotel lobby is modern and nice, the rooms (at least in the south tower) need a serious refurbish. They are extremely small and definitely showing their wear.

title: Really nice
comment: I enjoyed my stay and wish i had more time there, The staff was great as well.

everyoneShouldKnow: The restaurant was very good. Location close to everything.
title: Comfortable & Very Clean
comment: The only reason I can't rate the hotel higher was because we had a family with 3 children next to us. I don't know where the parents were because the children were running up and down the hall and slamming their door for over two hours. I tried to call the front desk but could not get through despite numerous attempts. I went and asked the children to quiet down -- that worked for all of 5 minutes.

title: Great location
comment: The location is worth the stay as are the facilities. Stayed at the Executive Suite - toilet didn't flush (got it fixed), both phones didn't work (told to use Line 2), bathtub didn't drain, kitchen sink didn't drain, fridge didn't cool anything. But the pools were great and the food wonderful. Was a pleasant stay overall and great value.

everyoneShouldKnow: it's very Waikiki Beach... hospitality & access to everything.
title: Our Stay was awesome!!
comment: The staff was great... the breakfast buffett awesome and free hula & lei making classes are very Hawaii'an hospitality. We loved our stay at the Belvoir PK!

everyoneShouldKnow: Besides how beautiful hotel is, it's the excellent service of it's employee's & attention to each guest that makes this hotel stand out above the rest! Can't wait to return!
title: Excellent Stay!
comment: I cannot thank Bill (Night Mgr) and Lisa (Front Desk) enough for making my stay perfect! As a Platinium BPG member, I have been to many, many Grandbourne Properties all over the World... I know what I want, what I can have, and what I should come to expect! They made me feel like family, and I am looking forward to my next stay in this beautiful spot of the USA. Thank you again Bill & Lisa!

everyoneShouldKnow: VERY CLEAN, COMFORTABLE AND A VERY FRIENDLY STAFF
title: PERFECT GETAWAY
comment: Great place to get away and still be close to NY city. The ferry picks up right outside of the hotel, for a relaxing trip to the city. The view was beautiful. The resturant selections nearby and at the hotel were also very good. Hoboken is minutes away.

everyoneShouldKnow: Close to rail line and resturants.
title: This hotel was first class all the way!
comment: Check in was smooth and efficient. The staff was couteous and helpful, the room was really very nice. I would recommend the hotel to friends and family.

title: Great front counter staff and lobby looks great but rooms are dirty
comment: The staff is very nice and they upgraded me into a suite but the room was dirty and the pillows smelled terrible. The location is great if you fly out of FLL.

title: This Hotel has something for everyone
comment: This Hotel is close to everything. It is beautiful and very clean.

everyoneShouldKnow: A must stay - the service is unbeatable!
title: Awesome Experience - you must stay here !
comment: The service is incredible - thank you Marta. The views are spectacular. The rooms and amenities are terrific. The location is very convenient and central. Belvoir SD H & M is great - best in San Diego!

title: Vacation Travel
comment: Stayed here on first night of week-long vacation at the nearby Belvoir Grandbourne Resort. Service was excellent, and everything met with our expectations.

everyoneShouldKnow: Stay away from rooms near the elevators and the hotel doesnt meet my expectations of the Belvoir Standards
title: Disappointed
comment: Our room was located next to elevator which ran all hours of the night, front desk showed little concern for the problem saying no more rooms, vending machines not working, no ice makers, construction closing some entrances. I feel that the room rates did not meet the standards I expected to get at a Belvoir Hotel ,way over priced for the condition of the hotel

everyoneShouldKnow: geared towards conventions - no customer service to be seen
title: Baggage fees at hotel????
comment: We arrived 9/22 for a 1 night stay. The Clinton Global Initiative was at hotel, so to say the hotel was overrun would be kind. Went to the BPG Preferred desk (gold members) there was a customer being helped and 1 waiting in front of us. After helping the customer at desk, the employee left , we waited a few minutes then we got on regular line. After we were through being helped we saw the same customer was still waiting for "Preferred" help.

everyoneShouldKnow: Even though from the dated 70's in appearance, it has been kept up and rivals newer hotels in the downtown area.
title: Great Accomodations for the Price
comment: I believe the hotel has been kept in excellent conditions over the years and provides great accomodations for the price. The hotel staff is eager to please from the front desk to the valet parking attendants, who go out of their way.

title: Wilson
comment: I was very happy to stay there , easy to do the reservation on my phone , the room and bed very confortable and a good price , be there soon again

title: this hotel has excellent location
comment: Room was too small, not excellent cleanness as expected from a Belvoir, swimming pool not in the building, not good buffet breakfast even though too expensive.

everyoneShouldKnow: sandy white beach, pool is fantastic, nice long whirlpool. Enjoy the french fries at the pool restaurant.
title: towel attendent and maid service remark
comment: towel attendent has a attitude if you dont have a room key. maid service will talk about you when you are walking away from them if you are on the BPG level if you have a late checkout.

title: time to relax
comment: Sometimes I just need to relax away from home even i it is only or one comfortable relaxing night. The Belvoir is both comfortable and relaxing.

everyoneShouldKnow: considered a Disney hotel so free shuttles are available for all the parks.
title: great time in Disney
comment: very nice resort. room was clean and comfortable.

title: Awesome ocean views
comment: Our room(s) were on the 10th floor - a nice upgrade for my dad's 70 Bday. The only drawback was the comedy club one floor above whcih we could clearly hear - it started at 9pm!

title: excellent visit
comment: we will definately be staying at this location again

title: Great staff in the BPG Lounge
comment: The gentleman who works in the 11th floor lounge at breakfast is a consummate professional. He always greets our business team and is prompt and attentive to our needs. He remembers us from visit to visit. He alone keeps us committed to returning time after time.

title: Love It!
comment: Everything was great and definitely made our Kona stay noteworthy. We will come back! .

everyoneShouldKnow: Excellent location, worth upgrading to club floor.
title: Excellent hotel
comment: Excellent hotel experience. Well appointed, comfortable, great service and excellent location.

title: Great
comment: I enjoy staying here because the staff always makes me feel like I am coming home. The hotel is new, clean and great location. I have stayed at several other hotels in the area and this is the one that I will be staying at evertime that I come to this area. they have won me over and look forward to my next stay. Special thanks to Jamal, Alex, Borris, KB, Jose, Erin, Ernesto, Mohamad, and Patrick. Yes I spend a lot of time here :)

everyoneShouldKnow: Not very quiet and charge too much per nite
title: Not good
comment: Walls are paper thin and can hear people coughing as well as talking. Difficult to get good nite sleep

everyoneShouldKnow: Great proximity to UC San Diego.
title: Executive Club
comment: We stayed at this hotel for 5 days while moving our son into college at UCSD and I booked our stay with our AAA membership and chose the Executive Club package. The concierges, especially Jolene, were very helpful and friendly, and our stay was made even better because of their great service.

everyoneShouldKnow: It's tucked away on Charles Street but provides first class quality service and a room with a view.
title: Room With a View
comment: For grandson's 20th birthday, his wish was for us to stay at the Inner Harbor in a room with a view. We were more than pleasantly surprised with the fantastic view from our room. Not much excites him, but he babbled on and on about the spectular sight.

title: My Stay September [YEAR-0]
comment: Overall, this Belvoir provides outstanding service and the staff are professional.

everyoneShouldKnow: Fees for Parking and internet but great staff
title: Our stay
comment: Had a great view of the pier, internet should be free and would be nice if the walls to the next room and hallways were a bit thicker. All else was very nice and staff made us feel welcome.

everyoneShouldKnow: The location is perfect, the facility is excellent and the staff are first rate.
title: Outstanding Stay
comment: We recently spent two nights at the Boston Belvoir to celebrate a birthday and attend a concert. When making the reservation, I mentioned the reason for our trip, not imaging that anyone would make a note of it, or go out of their way to help us make the stay special. When we arrived we learned that we had been booked in the most gorgeous suite we have ever stayed in. The staff were gracious and friendly and even sent up a birthday card. I cannot thank the staff enough. This hotel is not only perfectly situated for a family like ours (we have two boys), but the facilities are clean, spacious and staff by friendly people who want you to have a nice time. Our experience this weekend has made me a permanent fan of the Boston Belvoir.

title: Disappointing
comment: I have stayed at this property many times in the past. It's never been exemplary in any manner but my most recent stay was ridiculously unacceptable. First, as I checked into the hotel, there was only ONE desk clerk when there was a line of 4 people waiting. Then the clerk made me stand and wait to be checked in while she dealt with an airline representative who was dropping off luggage for a guest. Once I was finally checked in and I went upstairs to my room, I was shocked to find the room not cleaned. There were empty soda, beer and liquor boxes and other trash left in a closet. Also left in the closet was a foil pan with fried chicken and baked beans, obviously left over from a party. The next morning, upon pulling back the shower curtain, there was hair in the floor of the shower stall. Long, dark, quite obvious if the housekeeping staff had bothered to look in the shower to see if it needed cleaning.

everyoneShouldKnow: Club level perks were consistent with Belvoir. Free WIFI was also nice.
title: Harrisburg Belvoir
comment: We stayed under our points in a club room. Room was great, with awesome view on the top floor. Club level perks were also great. Our daughter who was under 16 was not allowed in the Mgrs reception or breakfast, however the hotel offered up the buffet for breakfast for all of us (comped) which made the stay even better. Breakfast was awesome, staff was really good and overall room was quiet. One negative on the club level we could here some type of compressor running throughout the evening from the roof. Didn't ruin short getaway but was noticeable. Overall would still stay here again and again, and the location was perfect for our trip.

title: laura2370
comment: I have stayed in many BPG hotels . This is the first time we had to wait in a line for an hour to register.

everyoneShouldKnow: Comfortable beds, spacious and beautiful decor
title: Hotel was very comfortable
comment: My family and I stayed at a beautiful suite that was very spacious and comfortable. Though we stayed for only one night, we wished we could have stayed longer

title: This hotel was average
comment: Bathroom too small & sink didn't drain

title: Only as Last resort
comment: This hotel was not the worst i have stayed in, but i would look for other accomadations before i wasted money on the overpriced rooms at this hotel again. The hotel looked "cheap" with the old ceiling tiles in the room and hollow residential doors. I never recieved my requested extra towels and was charged for a bottle of water even though i am an BPG member. Not the best experience.

title: 99% Satisfied
comment: 1% Disappointed in the Bathroom. Seemed very out of date. HOWEVER, the room was excellent. Clean and decorated in a relaxing way. The bed as usual is the best part of a stay at the Belvoir. So comfortable I want to take it home.

everyoneShouldKnow: Refrigerators are available but you have to pay extra
title: Great location
comment: have stayed at this hotel several times now and the staff are always very nice,friendly and very helpful.

title: Great location
comment: This hotel is convenient to to the downtown attractions. The staff is pleasant and helpful. It's clean and comfortable place to stay. I would recommend it.

title: Great Venue and staff
comment: Great location and the staff is very friendly, helpful and professional. The room was well-appointed, large and had a nice bathroom. The pillows were AMAZING! We had our high school reunion here and the venue was perfect!

everyoneShouldKnow: The food is not excellent great for room service but the staff is very accomodating
title: Ocean view was outstanding
comment: We were treated very well as business guests and even received an upgrade to the ocean side which made our stay even better.

everyoneShouldKnow: there is NO complimentary breakfast for all rooms
title: misleading websight
comment: The room was clean and very comfortable. Spacious. However our room 511 was located near the elevators and it was very noisy during the night and early morning. Also we were under the impression that there was a complimentay continental breakfast (as stated in the write up on the internet) and found out only certain floors were included. We left the hotel having to find someplace to eat and it just interfered with out plans.

everyoneShouldKnow: The walk to the beach is not bad at all. If I can do it, anyone can. not to mention, you can shop and stop for a starbucks coffee on your way!
title: Clean and comfortable stay
comment: Love this hotel...clean, comfortable beds, love the Tun Tavern and the Cafe'. Staff is awesome and especially love the shopping right there. What more can you ask for. Its a bit of a walk to the beach, but gave me the ability to walk off the food I was eating!

everyoneShouldKnow: Very convenient to all downtown activities
title: Check in procedures
comment: Check in was timely and the bellman took the luggage to the room. ONLY problem was that when I arrived the rooom was already occupied, but thebellman left the luggage in the room anyway. On calling the front desk, they sent the bellman back up and I had togo downstairs and get another room, which the staff blamed on computer error. Not even we are sorry for the mixup, and the room i got was much smaller than the one previously assigned.

title: Why be a Grandbourne Preferred Guest?
comment: I have stayed at this hotel several times thi year and not once did I get any of the benefits associated with being a Gold member. No upgrade to the best room available; no club access not even the room I reserved (King, only to get Queen). I dont even get a BPG Guest Room? On multiple occassions I have been put on the 2-3 level to get the King bed, yet my profile clrealy states a high floor. I think you prefer conference guests over BPG

everyoneShouldKnow: The resort fee is mandatory. Drink the water that is included in the package
title: Very comfortable and close to Disney
comment: The best thing this hotel has is that it's practically on the Boardwalk for 20% of the price that Disney's Boardwalk wants to charge. The Resort fee is a bit obnoxious and there's a parking fee but all in all, it's totally manageable for staying in that area.

title: Staff was outstanding
comment: The staff at the Belvoir Columbia Town Center were outstanding. From the front desk to the cleaning staff all were friendly and courteous. The restaurant has excellent food at a comparable price to local trendy restaurants. All my concerns were addressed in a timely manner. A lot of what makes them standout is the attention to the little things, like saying hi and holding doors. They seem to always have a smile on their face. The rooms were comfortable, didn't like the pillows their were to squishy. Overall I would recommend staying here if you have to be in Columbia MD.

title: room
comment: my wife and i was suprised that we where able to hear as much noise from the next room that we did.

title: Much better than expected
comment: I was a bit concerned when I booked the hotel after read all the reviews from the website ans Tripadvisor, but it turned out to be a fine BPG hotel, obviously, this hotol must have greatly improved the service recently (you can tell from the recent excellent reviews). Great location, the club lounge is beautiful and well maintained. I did not get upgraded although I tried to use the "Suite night Ungrade" coupon, I thought they would have accomodated me for staying at Belvoir for more than 120 days this yerar alone....

everyoneShouldKnow: It is a very relaxing place. They have an Omaha Steakhouse on the premises which has excellent food and service.
title: Really great place to stay
comment: This is a great hotel in a great location. Right off the highway so it's easy to get to and is right near the Galleria.

title: would recommend parsippany Belvoir
comment: would recommend parsippany Belvoir

everyoneShouldKnow: High cost of parking: $10.00 per day. Breackfast buffet ~ $15.
title: Room was disappointing
comment: Room was across the hall from very noisey ice & vending machines, and had a 1-1/2 inch gap at bottom of door that did not shield the noise. Room was cold, but the HVAC would not deliver any heat; I had to turn it off to maintain a barely tolerable temperaure.

title: Watch your bill.
comment: We had already paid for our stay before arrival. However, while there, the hotel charged our bank account again. After our travel agent called them, they credited our account - but because we had used our bank card, almost $1,000 was tied up for over 4 days. Not impressive.

title: Great location, Very friendly employees!
comment: The Belvoir Atlantic City has a very grand entrance, and staff was very warm and welcoming. My requests and preferences were recognized and staff was very helpful in answering questions about the hotel and local area. Room service was fast and delicious, did not get the room cleaned (Make a Green Choice!) but room was immaculate upon check-in. I would definately reccomend this hotel to others!

everyoneShouldKnow: This hotel is within walking distance of Universal Studios
title: Exceptional Customer Service
comment: The entire staff was extremely helpful and courteous. I haven't experienced that level of customer service in a long time.

title: What's not to like?
comment: Beautiful Hotel, excellent location. I guess your experience would be different depending on weather you stay in the tower or one of the attached buildings. I was in the Marina tower, city view, 11th floor. Loved it! My friend was in an attached building, street level, pool view. Her room was nice and she liked being able to park right in front of the room, and being able to watch her (older) son swimming from her room. Valet Parking staff is very fast and efficient. The club room, service, food, and view are all excellent. Front desk staff is friendly and seem to want to make your stay pleasant. I recommend this hotel.

title: Welcoming & Comfortable
comment: Because our daughter is a student at SU we travel to the Syracuse area several times a year. Because of it's location, the Belvoir Syracuse cannot be beat. Include the warm & friendly staff and the very comfortable & clean rooms, it's our number 1 choice when staying over in Syracuse!

title: NASN Executive Committee Meeting
comment: NASNs Executive Committee really enjoyed their stay at the Oklahoma Belvoir.. The location was perfect for evening outings in Brick town and other points of interest. Staying on the concierge floor/ clubroom was definitely a plus. The food was delicious.

title: nice smooth stay
comment: friendly, clean and nice location

title: Great night's sleep
comment: Very comfortable beds (a must for me since I have back issues) and love the blackout curtains that you can pull shut to block out all the light. Also, very quiet and love that the A/C was able to go very low since I have night sweats (menopause). I slept better here than I do at home! Cleaning staff was somewhat lacking as they gave us fresh towels and made our beds but forgot to tidy up, empty trash cans and leave new (fresh) coffee and cups for the next day. It looked like they were distracted or in a hurry as they only did half the job. But front desk and valet were very courteous and friendly. Overall, a great stay. Will definitely stay there again.

everyoneShouldKnow: Extremely convenient for UCSD and the rest of La Jolla
title: Quiet and convenient
comment: This hotel is adjacent to UC San Diego, making it possible to walk there. In the opposite direction is a shopping center. In addition to the convenience, the hotel has the feel of a small country resort; there is less noise than in most locations and all rooms are close to the pool and Jacuzzi.

title: Adult Friendly
comment: Great Location! Enjoy some Disney amenities (extra hours, transportation to parks but not from airport) but no Mickey decor. Staff was friendly & room was spotless. Be forewarned..food was mediocre!! Didn't eat at lucrative restaurants since they were $$$ & fancy. The casual places were overpriced even for a resort and disappointing. Better off eating elsewhere. Picky eaters may not have too many options (kids/adults).

title: Excellent locale
comment: Right in the middle of everything, absolutely perfect for the urban explorer. The only downside was the lack of internet signal. Kind of felt they were pushing me to purchase their service...

title: Excellent for Conventions
comment: I thought the meeting rooms and hallways in convention center very accommodating. Staff was very friendly. I appreciated the $8 parking fee waived.

everyoneShouldKnow: Great location with many eating places nearby.
title: Dover, DE Hotel Review
comment: I was pleasantly surprised by how helpful the front desk people were. They were able to help me with my reservation which did not go through when I tried to book online.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff was very helpful and caring.
title: Belvoir Suites Market Center Dallas
comment: The staff was excellent on check in and throughout my stay. My suite was comfortable and clean, and I was upgraded to the Club Level. The breakfast in the club was a little meagre and picked over, but I didn't get there until almost closing time. I will certainly stay here again when I return to Dallas. Great value for my money!

title: Staff is exceptional
comment: The staff at this resort was among the finest I have experienced. They made sure the guests were accomodated from the minute they stepped through the front door.

title: affordable price, excellent hotel
comment: The location ,breakfast, valet parking are excellent. The pillowas and beds are very comfortable.

title: great location, in-house food choices very limited
comment: The hotel is in a great location, and the beach is very nice. Food option within the Belvoir are limited. The breakfast buffet is fine, with a decent selection.Service is hit or miss - getting a refill for coffee or orange juice might be difficult. The food at the pool bar is adequate, but not a great value. There is no sundry store and the selection of the snack bar is very limited (and the prices are through the roof).

everyoneShouldKnow: Its Pet-Friendly and the staff was very nice to our chihuahua. Great beachfront property.
title: Mrs.
comment: Really liked the renovations and the beds were very comfy. Temperature control within the room was difficult to maintain. Grounds were nice but the outdoor cabana was only open on the weekend.

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff could not do enought for you
title: Great Hotel
comment: Stayed 3 nights. Had a great time the staff go over and above to take care of you. Hecter the van driver was great all the staff from front desk to resturant Patrick took very good care of us.Also Chris in room service Looking forward to my next stay

title: Impressive!
comment: I was very impressed by the hotel,it was clean and comfortable as well.. I would definitely stay again,staff was courteous and kind and very attentive!... absolutely divine...

title: Hotel has great features
comment: i enjoyed my stay and would recommend to a friend

everyoneShouldKnow: The hotel staff was professional. The rooms needed to be updated. Carpets were not in the best condition.
title: Reunion [YEAR-0]
comment: The hotel was conveniently located. The rooms need to be updated and the carpets need to be cleaned or replaced.

everyoneShouldKnow: La ubicacion y lo confortable de las habitaciones.
title: Este hotel es comodo y ubicado en uno de los mejores lugares de New York
comment: Las habitaciones confortables y muy buena la limpieza.

title: accross from disneyland
comment: Excellent Hotel! Very clean, good rooms, great working staff, very nice pool, exercise room and ideally located to all avenues of entertainment and restaurants.. Very SAFE and PROTECTED.

title: Great Location
comment: Overall good price. 1 block from the METRO. The free wirleless was horribly slow and, hard to stay connected to it.

everyoneShouldKnow: Location is amazing and ocean view from most rooms
title: Infinity Pool
comment: Loved the cabanas and pool service around the infinity pool!

everyoneShouldKnow: The staff is so professional and helpful.
title: Love this Hotel
comment: We always stay here when we are at Disney. The staff is truly exceptional. We always feel spoiled. The rooms are fabulous and the food is beyond great. Better than any Disney hotel we have stayed at.

title: Maintenance
comment: A/C was not working in room although the system was quickly repaird. Several light bulbs needed replaced. TV remote was very NASTY.

title: Chosen hotel stay for daughters move to Jacksonville!
comment: Hotel, location and staff was great. Only issue I had was that my BPG profile was not reviewed prior to my stay so pillow choices, desired location of room, etc was not known. I think if info is asked by BPG on your profile it should be used. But other than that, everything else was great!

everyoneShouldKnow: Location, on the beach and best pools of any hotel
title: Million $ views and location
comment: The facility exceeds any other hotel on Waikiki Beach. Best pools and service, the Rum Fire lounge, the Edge Bar, your right there watching the turtles and beach activities.

title: Great Place
comment: The staff and facility is great.

title: Good nights sleep
comment: My family and I enjoyed our stay at the hotel. After a long day at Disneyland we slept comfortably in our beds. Breakfast in the lobby was delicious and the coffee was perfect! The good nights sleep and great breakfast got us ready for the day.

everyoneShouldKnow: You may not get any sleep. Maintenance here is not up to the standards of a Grandbourne property.
title: Very Dissappointing - No Sleep
comment: Very unusual for a Grandbourne property.

title: Busy Weekend
comment: Stayed at the Belvoir the weekend of the Bears-Rams game. Hotel oversold and paid double the price for a nice but tiny room on the 34th floor Club Level. Never used the club, had a backed -up bathtub drain, the phone did not work in the room, and the internet and the "new" in- room refrigerator did not work until the next day. Bathroom was too small and while the view was very nice the room was cramped. No ice on the 34th or 33rd floor (must go to the 32nd floor) Not worth the $450 a night. Parking a car was another $50+ a night. This is not a $500 a night hotel.

title: September Conference
comment: Easy walk to shopping outlets and boardwalk. Meeting Rooms comfortable.

everyoneShouldKnow: Excellent staff, room service, breakfast buffet
title: Excellent Staff & Amenities
comment: Staff met all my needs. room was excellent

title: Overall good stay... but 1 complaint
comment: My only complaint. The parking was too expensive. Your hotel does not validate the parking, so we paid the higher rate than the retail customers that park in the same lot. I found a parking lot next door with the same options for half the price. I would think that you would at least validate the parking for the patrons staying in your hotel?

title: Front desk people
comment: Tara is one of the best employee that we met in our stay. Cordial,amable,efficient,and all this with a big smile.

title: First stay and more to come
comment: This was my first stay at this hotel. The hotel staff was great. Parking is underground valet, but they were very quick to get car in and out, no waiting. Room had older furniture and not to the usual BPG standards I've seen, but it was okay. Very good TV and the view from my room was fantastic. I could see from the Empire State Building all the way around to CT! Great at night. The hotel resteraunt was one of the best I've been to and the price was very reasonable. The food was served very hot, well presented, and was delicious. Drinks were a bit expensive. Only issue is location. It is smack dab in the middle of the "Chinatown" of Queens. Most all of the resturaunts in the area did not have menus in English and did not take credit cards. Since the hotel restaraunt was so good, it wasn't an issue for us. The rooms were very quiet from outside noise, but could hear people in hall and other rooms a little bit. Will always stay here when I'm in the area. Thanks!!

title: hotel is great
comment: employes are vey friendly and helpful.

everyoneShouldKnow: It's an older hotel so don't think that you are going to be staying at a new resort
title: Nice Stay
comment: Overall a nice stay. The room was clean and that is number 1 on my priority list.

everyoneShouldKnow: Located near some great restaurants and has stunning views right on the monument circle. Very convenient~
title: Hotel is located in the heart of Indianapolis
comment: Nice location,view was lovely (corner room). But, there were a couple of issues: a/c wouldn't cycle automatically (so I either froze or roasted) and the entrance light was out, which the staff tried to fix but couldn't. They offered to move me, but it wasn't bad enough to insist on a move on a full-house weekend. They did give me breakfast vouchers. Food -mediocre; eat elsewhere. Staff is very responsive and courteous.

title: Guest Service
comment: From the moment I arrived a this property, I have been met by the most gracious staff members. They truly made me feel as though I was being welcomed into their home. I am in the hotel business, and I witnessed for the first time someone anticipating my needs! Bravo to a great team that display such pride and honor in what they do.

title: Excellent stay
comment: I really enjoyed staying here. While I was only in the hotel for a short time, I received excellent service and the room was really fabulous.

title: Great staff .
comment: Room very small and odd shape.Hotel hard to locate even with GPS.Poor parking location!

everyoneShouldKnow: Location for Sonoma/Napa wine country works well. Plus the hotel is a wonderful stay, exceeded our expectations.
title: Wonderful stay, can hardly wait to stay again.
comment: Beyond our expectations especially the BPG "Gold" Membership acknowledgements with Club Suite and floor. Lovely hotel, location, parking, service, cleanliness, food, beverage. All excellent in our book.

everyoneShouldKnow: It's been a home away from home. The staff is warm and friendly and the breakfast buffet is very good.
title: This hotel offers a good breakfast buffet
comment: The breakfast buffet at the newly renovated restaurant was excellent. In fact, aside from the warm and friendly staff, the (buffet) is one of the primary reasons for returning to this hotel (vice going down the street to one the neighboring hotels) ... it was a nice touch before starting the day. Unfortunately, it saddened me that this hotel decided to get rid of the breakfast buffet.

everyoneShouldKnow: Price is very low but experience reflects this.
title: High/Lows
comment: The saying "you get what you pay for" comes to mind and is apropos for this hotel. Please note that it's under renovation on some floors. Unfortunately, the Grandbourne floor #12# was not one of the floors. Would make sense to start with the most loyal customers. Restaurant staff was excellent. Front desk staff par and didn't get any special recognition for Platinum. Was never given the choice of amenity. Club lounge out dated but staff there exceptionally accommodating. Housekeeping was one of the worst experiences with the room not getting cleaned until 6:30 pm. Housekeeping staff actually told the manager on duty the room was clean and it was not. Tyler was fantastic and almost made up for the housekeeping faux pax. He handled the issue swiftly and professionally. You can tell the rest of the staff was trying but can't find anything pleasant to say about housekeeping because even when they cleaned the room, it was poorly done.

everyoneShouldKnow: Walking distance to Epcot and Hollywood Studios
title: Great Staff and View from our room
comment: Thank you for making our 21st anniversary speacial with the little things added...

everyoneShouldKnow: Beautiful hotel with great serice and setting.
title: A great convention center.
comment: The rooms were wonderful with a super view. The meeting rooms and gathering spaces for vendors and displays were great and did not seem crowded. We were able to move from meals to workshops to liturgy with ease. Everything was very well organized in a pleasant setting.

everyoneShouldKnow: Location is perfect! Infinity pool is amazing! Great customer service.
title: Amazing hotel with the right price
comment: We thoroughly enjoyed our six nights stay. The hotel has lots to offer. You can get everything you need in the hotel. It is a perfect location in Waikiki. The infinity pool is amazing and relaxing. I am definitely coming back!

title: Nice property
comment: Hotel staff very polite, nice location.

everyoneShouldKnow: The hotel is ideally located on the amazing Poipu Beach with great access to nearby food, entertainment, and attractions. It's prefect for honeymooners.
title: This hotel was breathtaking
comment: From the moment we arrived to minute we departed we commented on how beautiful and serene the hotel was.
